Summary Heading: Not the room I paid for.
Summary: Room was quite large,  but not the room I had paid for, which was a north view of Disneyland At check in, the gentleman stated there was nothing he could do about that, and gave ma room looking at a parking lot.  Then there was the issue of no hot water for two mornings. I understand their short staffed, so I didn't complain until I checked out. My mistake,  should have asked for a different room. I would go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice clean hotel 10-15 easy walk to Disneyland.  There is two drugstores right next door to the hotel, and a wide variety of restaurants close by as well.  Elevators can be a little crowded during certain times of the day, so beware
Manager Response: Dear Jere,  It sounds like our location was perfect for your fun plans in Anaheim, and we couldn't be happier! Hopefully, our clean and cozy rooms made for the ideal place to rest after your adventures as well. Thanks so much for choosing us for your lodging needs, and we hope to have you back soon!

Summary: Everything was great, didn’t love that was no central heat/air and just the plug in unit and towels are a little worn but outside of that it was good. Staff was super friendly and it was only about 15 minutes from hotel to Disney gate! Would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms are so comfortable, totally clean all areas, I think that is good but can be excellent if the parking lot should be included on the price of reservation. The personal required knowledge in all services or discounts including in the reservation.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We appreciate you shining the spotlight on our comfortable accommodations and high standards of cleanliness. Your feedback regarding aspects of your stay that could have been even better is gratefully received and allows us to continually review and improve guest satisfaction. Should your travels bring you back to the area in the future, we hope you'll consider staying with us again!

Summary: We loved this Hotel. The location was awesome and we loved the feel and way the interior was decorated. My only complaint was with the Wi-Fi, kinda crappy. But the beds were comfortable and the staff so helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent visit to Anaheim. We're glad you had an excellent stay with us and that you enjoyed our unique decor, convenient location, comfortable beds, and exceptional service. Your comments are important to us, and we'll use them as we continually work to improve the connectivity of our internet. Please allow us to host you again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Familiar faces are a welcome sight, so come back soon!

Summary: This is our 2nd year in a row staying here for the high school Pom Nationals! This hotel's location is perfect for walking to the Convention Center, Disneyland, & Anaheim's Garden Walk for eating. This hotel is very well-priced for the location. This hotel is very clean. The hotel staff was extremely friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy, Thank you for staying with us again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It is wonderful to hear that you once again liked our friendly guest service and found our location convenient for attending your event. Please come back again in the future.

Summary Heading: Cute Hotel, Great Location, Amazing Staff
Summary: From the moment we checked in and they gave us our complimentary cocktail, we knew it would be a great stay.  Checking in was fast and easy.  Our agent was super friendly and the manager Gaby was so sweet and accommodating.  We will definitely be coming back to stay whenever we are in the area for Disney or the Convention Center, which are both within walking distance!
Room tip: The suites are great located next to the pool
Manager Response: Dear Sarah, Guests can expect to have all that they need to have a five-star stay when they choose Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It is wonderful to know that you enjoyed your time with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future. That said, we hope you already have plans in the works to return to Anaheim soon.

Summary: My 13 yo son and I stayed here for a week. Staff were all very nice & helpful.  About a 15 min walk to park. We sometimes took the ART. Lol pool area was great. Beds and pillows were amazing.   The decor and pictures throughout were adorable.  My only complaint was we had one of those room connector doors and over the long weekend, a family with young very exhausted kids moved in and it was non stop screaming.  I am not sure if they have any rooms w/o but if they do, I would recommend one. Lol   Parking $30 a night tho?? Ouch! I only rented a car for two nights.   Although we enjoyed the hotel, likely won’t stay there next time.
Manager Response: We're grateful to have had the opportunity to host you and your son. Our property offers an ideal location in Anaheim, within walking distance of Disneyland. However, we regret the noise issue you experienced during your stay. Please know we encourage you to contact our front desk for problems such as this, as we aim to create a restful environment. Despite this, we're glad you appreciated our friendly service and cozy beds. We would be honored if you considered staying with us again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary: Great rooms, comfortable beds, amazing pillows. Very good service from the crew. It has a very good location near to Disney parks, pharmacies and restaurants. The parking is very useful, and it has very fast access.
Manager Response: Dear Juan, We are thrilled to see we had the right recipe for an outstanding visit to Disneyland; a comfortable bed, an amazing location, and friendly staff. It was our honor to host you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Served our need but nothing memorable
Summary: Room was comfortable enough, could hear quite a bit from hall and surrounding rooms but we were so tired it wasn’t a big issue. Public areas (halls, pool area) were a little worn and dingy. It was cooler one afternoon when the kids wanted to swim, we called guest services about lighting the fire pits for the adults to sit by while the kids swam. They said yes but never came. Overall no major complaints but we’ll likely try a different one next time. $30 per day for parking really adds up too.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you could stay with us and were comfortable in our room, but we regret that you experienced other issues with cleanliness and our staff. Our hotel always wants our guests to leave satisfied, and we apologize that this was not the case. Thank you for your review, and we want to welcome you back again so we may correct where we fell short on this visit.

Summary: Savannah and the rest of the girls up front were kind and caring. This hotel smelled wonderful anywhere I walked around, it didn’t have a musty smell or strong odors from cleaning products. My room was quiet, clean, spacious and had a wonderful view. It has a Starbucks, Walgreens, CVS all within walking distance. Disneyland was a 10 minute walk from the hotel as well. I felt very safe being in the hotel and walking around the immediate area as a single woman on a trip.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen, It was truly a pleasure to host your recent stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We're delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable visit and appreciated the excellent hospitality our team provided, as well as our clean, quiet, and spacious accommodations. We're also pleased that you enjoyed our convenient and safe location, especially traveling alone. Thank you for sharing your kind comments, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back the next time you're in the area.

Summary Heading: A decent little place for a business trip or a trip to Disney.
Summary: A decent little place for a business trip or a trip to Disney. Nice heated pool and bar. Nothing super fancy, but it is cute and clean. There was 3 elevators, but one wasn't working. The staff was very nice and helpful with all questions and needs.
Manager Response: Dear Emilie,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We appreciate you shining the spotlight on our high standards of cleanliness and friendly, dedicated team. If you have any suggestions for ways we can make your next visit exceed expectations, please feel free to reach out to us offline.

Summary: Hotel lulu was amazing! Our family had a 3 night stay and enjoyed it top to bottom. We were greeted by Shannon, who was absolutely top notch. We arrived a few hours early for check in and she made our wait comfortable and enjoyable. The room was pretty standard but perfect for our needs as we spent most of the time at Disney. Pool was great, only downside is it loses the sun pretty early, but no biggie if you’re there to explore Disney anyways. The decor, staff and stay were all 10/10. Would and will highly recommend.
Manager Response: We were delighted to host you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Our team is thrilled to have exceeded your expectations during your three-night vacation in Anaheim. We're glad you were warmly welcomed to our property by Shannon, who strives to deliver exceptional service. Thank you for this review, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Excellent hotel with amazing staff and rooms.  The beds and pillows were the most comfortable in my life.    I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Anaheim for business and pleasure
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review and recommendation! We're glad our friendly staff and comfortable beds impressed you. The next time you're in town, please come stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection again.

Summary: Hotel Lulu is ok but definitely not great. The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was clean but a little worn. The hot water was not always very hot. There were no drawers to put away clothes. No hooks in the bathroom to hang a wet towel. There was a refrigerator, microwave coffee in the room. Just ok
Manager Response: Dear Leiah, Thank you for highlighting our clean facilities and hospitable staff. Unfortunately, it appears there were some aspects of your stay that you were not a fan of.  Our Standard King Bed Room may have had some of the amenities you were hoping for, and we certainly recommend you give it a try on your next visit. However, as we work to improve the overall guest experience, we will discuss your feedback. We appreciate you sharing your experience and hope to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary: I stayed at the hotel with my family and rented two rooms.  I requested that they be as close to each other as possible, and got them next to each other.  The staff was friendly and the rooms were very clean.  I will definitely be staying there again in the future.
Manager Response: If you're looking for clean accommodations to relax in or top-notch service, look no further than Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. The cherry on top of all of this is our unbeatable location. Thank you so much for the perfect rating. We can't wait to welcome you and your family back again soon.

Summary: Room was clean, good size and the staff was great. Super friendly and helpful. Great location, walking distance to the convention center. Lobby was a nice place to hang out. Coffee was good and they had a bar and food. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Tony, It was truly a pleasure to host your recent stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection for your recent family reunion. We're delighted to hear that you had such an enjoyable experience and appreciated our clean and comfortable accommodations, as well as the friendly hospitality our team provided. Thank you so much for sharing your positive review, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on another occasion.

Summary: Savannah was awesome she really made us feel catered too room was perfect had connecting rooms breakfast was spot on delicious staff was super friendly. Pillows and beds were comfortable. Complimentary cocktails were delicious
Manager Response: Dear Savannah, It was a pleasure hosting you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We're glad our tasty breakfast, comfortable beds, and friendly staff impressed you. Thank you for your kind words. Please come see us again soon.

Summary: The location was great for visiting Disneyland.  One mile via Harbor Blvd, or even shorter going to the DIsney parking and taking the shuttle.   There was no housekeeping unless requested, and even after requestion refreshed towels and paper coffee cups that was not provided.   The staff was pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We're excited to know that our great location suited your travel needs so well and appreciate you highlighting its convenience to your fellow travelers. Your feedback regarding aspects of your stay that could have been even better is gratefully received and allows us to continually review and improve guest satisfaction. It was a pleasure having you here with us, and we hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: I got a 2 queen bed room because it was cheaper than the 1 king bed room. The room had a microwave, fridge, safe, hairdryer, shampoo and conditioner, etc. It had everything needed. It even had a shuttle to Disneyland, it costs $6 for the whole day. I would definitely stay here again and recommend Hotel Lulu.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review and recommendation! We're glad our affordable, well-appointed rooms had everything you needed and that you appreciated the park shuttle. The next time you're in town, please come see us again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary Heading: Internet Issues and expensive daily parking
Summary: The location is really good. Complimentary drinks upon arrival check in was delicious. We went for a Disney trip for my daughter’s birthday. It’s close to Disneyland. We were there for three days and could not connect to the internet though. We were in the south tower and our connection would always say no internet connection and had to use our mobile data for entire trip. Also, parking is expensive, even if a guest wanted to come over for a few hours and say hi they would have to pay full price all day and night parking for just a couple of hours. It was a cute hotel with a nice pool and fire pits although we won’t be back because of the internet issues.
Manager Response: Guest feedback is valuable as we constantly work to ensure we provide all our guests would need to have a great stay. That said, we will have our maintenance team look into the internet issues you mentioned. We are pleased that you enjoyed so many other aspects of your stay, and we hope you will consider revisiting us in the future. Until then, we wish you safe travels.

Summary: When we arrived the check in was a easy process. One of our beds wasn’t made when we got to our room.The tv only allowed us to watch tbs. I didn’t complain but I expect better when we are paying more than $150 per night.Also I heard them offer another person checking in a complimentary drink from the bar in the hotel which wasn’t offered to us. A little Inconsistent.
Manager Response: Dear Yvette,  Thank you for taking a moment to leave us a review. Guest feedback is always appreciated, as we consider it to be a valuable learning opportunity. Please accept our apologies for not providing you with a stay that fits your needs and our own standards. We will use your feedback to continue improving our services. It was a pleasure having you here with us and we hope to see you again in the future for another opportunity to provide you with the experience you expect and deserve.

Summary: Rooms are updated, beds were really comfortable. Staff was super friendly. Loved the complementary cocktail at check in. 10 minute walk to the park. My only complaint was there was no water pressure.
Manager Response: Dear Alexis,  It was such a pleasure to welcome you to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We appreciate you shining the spotlight on our comfortable accommodations, hospitable team, and excellent location. We'll be sure to have our maintenance team look into your concerns about the water pressure and we appreciate you letting us know. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: All the staff was very friendly and helpful! Hotel was clean and we loved the complimentary drink we got when we checked in! Unfortunately the pool heater was broken when we were there so it was too cold to swim in January but other than that no complaints! It was a short walk to Disney and am the Anaheim convention center where we had a gymnastics meet. Also great walking distance to a lot of great restaurants and the “garden walk” with lots of cool shops.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you as our guest, and we’re elated that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. From our friendly team to our dedication to the highest cleanliness standards, we strive to exceed expectations with every visit. Hopefully, you were able to take full advantage of the convenience our great location offers our guests and we appreciate you highlighting it to your fellow travelers. Thank you so much for your great review and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I like this place. Convenient and clean. I stayed here quite a few times. Whenever I'm in OC, I make it a point to book a room here. :) Secure entrance and exit. The staff that works the front desk are so friendly and inviting.
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to welcome back a repeat guest, and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection once again! We always endeavor to exceed expectations, and we're thrilled that our high standards of cleanliness and hospitable team reflected that. Thanks for your kind words, and we look forward to another chance to serve you at our lovely property!

Summary: This is a great base for a trip to Disneyland. The room was clean and cleaned upon request which we used twice in our 5 night stay. It was very central near everything we needed. Would recommend this hotel.   Few things worth nothing , there is no hand held shower. We had to update our key cards nightly before going back to the room otherwise they didn't work.   Other than that the stay was great.
Manager Response: Dear Jade, Thanks for allowing us to host your Disneyland trip! We trust you had a phenomenal trip to the park, and we're glad you enjoyed our clean accommodations and convenient location. Should your travels bring you back our way, it would be a privilege to welcome you back.

Summary: My stay at Lulu Hotel wasn’t bad. The hotel is conveniently located several blocks from Disney and they are basically right next door to IHOP, Starbucks, and Walgreens. The rooms were clean. However, the towels in one of the rooms were dirty/stained. I had to call them for more towels and some of those turned out to be dirty/stained. They only have one elevator working by the check in desk.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection to host your recent stay. We're delighted to hear you had a pleasant experience and appreciated our convenient and central location, as well as our clean accommodations. However, please accept our apologies if the towels were not cleaned to our usual high standards; we will certainly address this with our housekeeping team and work together to ensure improvements are made. We're grateful for your feedback, and we hope to have the pleasure of your company the next time you're in the area.

Summary: The breakfast was the best breakfast I've had at a Disneyland hotel. Customer service was great, room was clean, and beds were comfortable. Loved everything about it. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Margie, Thank you so much for the stellar feedback. Our fresh and cozy accommodations are a perfect retreat here in town. Along with our tasty breakfast, we strive to provide all the convenience of home. Hosting you again would mean the world, so please come back soon!

Summary: Great stay. But it took quite a while to get towels and hot water. They need to answer the phones more :-). Couldn’t get a hold of anyone for hours at the front desk to get towels.  So we used wet and dirty one for quite sometime.  The only thing tho
Manager Response: Dear Jill, We always appreciate hearing from our guests, and we're glad your overall stay was pleasant. However, we apologize for any issues with the bathroom and service. We'll pass your comments along to our staff for further review, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great staff, low key boutique hotel close to everything.  Comfortable and quiet stay 5min walk to the convention center and 12 min walk to Disney at a kids pace.  Room service is not great but fast if you need it. Will stay here again for business or with family.
Manager Response: Dear Robert, Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your thoughts. We're glad our convenient location and comfortable, quiet rooms impressed you. The next time you're in town, we'd be happy to host you again.

Summary: This was our first stay with Hotel Lulu and not only was it was the more affordable option that was walking distance from Disneyland...but it was a much pleasurable stay. First off, the lobby staff were so kind. We were able to get our room early and received a complimentary cocktail. (Which was delicious) They were so easy to work with and talk to and was a smooth experience. The room itself was very nice as well. Seems updated and clean. We didn't need to have our room cleaned but that is upon request and parking is around $30 nightly. Loved this stay here very much and will come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Guests love being within walking distance of Disneyland, and it's terrific you also appreciated our clean accommodations and friendly service. Please visit us again next time you vacation in Anaheim!

Summary: I highly recommend Hotel Lulu.  The theming of the hotel is so cute.  It’s a 70,s style beach theme hotel.  Upon check in, adults even get a complimentary vodka lemonade.  The room was spacious and clean.  The bed was so comfortable.   The microwave and refrigerator were a plus as well.  This hotel is located right next to the Toy Story lot so it was easy to walk in and take the free shuttles to Disneyland.  Also, you are able to keep your car parked until midnight of your check out date!  So we never had to pay for Disney parking . There are plenty of restaurants in the area as well.  Just a convenient location.  Also next to a Walgreens.  I also think the price was reasonable compared to other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent visit to Anaheim. We're glad you enjoyed our lovely facility, clean and spacious accommodations, excellent location, and exceptional value. It's the best compliment knowing you recommend us to fellow travelers. It would be our pleasure to host you again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, so come back soon!

Summary: Savanna was so kind snd courteous .  She let us know that if we needed anything to just give her a call at the front desk.  Everyone was so nice who works at the lulu.  I like the idea of feeling safe snd that’s what I felt at the lulu safe snd comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Rhonda, Our friendly staff works hard to ensure all our guests feel welcome and will be glad you appreciated their kind assistance. Thank you for the lovely review! Please come stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection again soon.

Summary: Super friendly staff. I loved the check-in cocktail, and enjoyed the property. Now trip advisor wants me to hit a minumum of 200 words, so I am just aimlessly typing. I feel I said all that needs to be said already. Yay hit the minimum.
Manager Response: Dear Sean, Thanks for the chuckle and the wonderful review of your stay with us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed everything about your stay with us, especially the check-in cocktail, and look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel was great and conveniently located close to the Disneyland parks as well as many food options around. The staff were friendly the rooms were clean. I will 100% be staying here again when I come visit the Disneyland Resort area!
Manager Response: Dear Julia, Thank you for the outstanding review of your recent stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We're glad you enjoyed your time with us and our clean accommodations, excellent location close to area theme parks and many dining choices, and friendly service. It's the best compliment knowing you'll visit us again when you return to Anaheim, so come back soon!

Summary: Everything was perfect. Out of all the hotels in the area I think Hotel Lulu is one of the best in price and customer service. Specifically Shannon at the front desk and bartender Wilbert were really nice and had great customer service!
Manager Response: Dear Gaby, On top of a comfortable stay, guests can expect great value and top-notch hospitality during every visit to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It is an honor to earn your compliments on your recent stay. We are elated that you plan to return and know that our team would be delighted to welcome you back for another five-star experience. Safe travels, and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: This hotel is an easy walking distance from  Disneyland. The rooms are spacious, clean, comfortable and very affordable!  We have stayed here several times and have never had an issue and love the convenience of it's location.
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn, We're proud to include you among our returning guests. It's great to know that our clean, comfortable rooms and close proximity to Disney keep you coming back to see us. We look forward to your next stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary: The staff were very friendly,the hotel was clean and the location was amazing pillows were soft enough and had multiple pillows as an option. It is pity that the parking lot is paid, but its very pleasant that many needs can be met by walking.
Manager Response: Our goal is to provide a five-star experience for every guest through features like our great location, heavenly beds, and wonderful service. We're happy to hear that our work paid off for you! The next time you're in Anaheim, we look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary Heading: Very welcoming experiences everyone was really kind rooms were nice and cozy too. Definitely would recommend family.
Summary: ,The front desk was very helpful, i didn't like my view of my first room but the front desk was very helpful and got me a better view and was very helpful. Will definitely come soon again. The room was great as well
Manager Response: Dear Jasmin, From our friendly team to our exceptional accommodations, it's a delight knowing that you had a wonderful time with us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We'd love nothing more than to welcome you back in the future for another cozy stay.

Summary: This was our third stay in one year at hotel, Lulu. The staff is courteous, helpful and kind. The complementary drink upon arrival is always a nice touch. The pool is great and we enjoy that we’re only a few short steps to the front gates of the Magic Kingdom.
Manager Response: The best part of any stay is often hanging out at the pool, and we're glad that you had such a good time at ours! It would be our pleasure to welcome you again to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection for another helpful and courteous visit.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights here. Easy check in and friendly staff, big thanks to Natalie ? working the afternoon shift. Very comfy beds, clean rooms and great location. Parking was easy. They had trolleys for packing your luggage with nice big wheels ( makes mush easier going over bumps and door jams). Good lighting all around hotel and easy to find you room. Great location while visiting Disneyland, lots of food options close by and transit just out the door. Highly recommend and would stay again
Manager Response: Dear Eric,  It was a pleasure to welcome you as our guest, and we’re elated that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we’re happy to hear our friendly team, comfortable suites, and high standards of cleanliness hit the mark for you. Hopefully, you were able to take full advantage of our convenient location. Thank you so much for recommending us to your fellow travelers and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The bed was as hard as a rock. The bathroom was falling apart and had no counter space. The bathroom was also dirty. The room itself felt old and dusty, it had a "dusty" kind of smell to it. The AC didn't work right either. I was up almost every 2 hours because I couldn't sleep. I never leave bad reviews but this room was terrible. The Service and people were great, breakfast was great. It was just my room.
Manager Response: Dear Kyle,  Thank you for taking a moment to leave us a review. We value your feedback and the time you've taken to share. While we're excited that our friendly team and delicious breakfast offerings were a highlight of your stay, we are distressed that the same cannot be said about our accommodations. Guest feedback is our foremost catalyst for effective change, so rest assured that we will use yours to guide our efforts. It would be an honor to have another chance to serve you and change your perceptions.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay first time here we liked how it wasn’t too far from Disney I believe it was like a 8min walk if that. We liked how Walgreens/CVS was literally right on the corner so it was nice to grab snacks water and for our stay. Ihop was right next door also loved how we had a restaurant shopping center across the street! Happy with the amenities the room had. Refrigerator worked great the microwave came in handy for the after park munchies. People who worked there were very polite. Will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection to host your stay. It is wonderful to hear that you liked our friendly, helpful staff and found our location convenient for exploring the local area. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Staying here has an easy walk to and from the park. The lobby area and room were clean. Right next to Walgreens to grab emergency items or snacks and a Strabucks for coffee in the morning.  Restaurant options very close as well.  Location is great
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We are delighted to see that you liked our clean accommodations and found our location convenient for your needs. Please come back and see us again in the future.

Summary: Great hotel near Disney! Friendly staff, renovated lobby, good restaurant for breakfast, nice clean rooms that are updated as well. Easy, safe 10 minute walk to Disney (with a 7 year old too!)  Would definitely recommend for families.
Manager Response: Dear Caitlin, Many types of travelers choose Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection for their accommodations, especially families for their magical vacations to Disney just across the street from our property. Your kind comments are greatly appreciated. We are thrilled to have delivered a five-star stay from check-in to check-out and everywhere in between! The next time you are looking for a great experience you can count on, then look no further.

Summary: Stayed 6 nights to do Disneyland.  We are seniors and had no trouble walking to the parks.  Close by are a lot of excellent restaurants.  Starbucks.  2 drug stores and more stores.   The microwave didn't work and the frig had all the interior shelving removed.  An employee came with 15 minutes of our calling and in another 10 minutes we had a new microwave and frig.  That is service.   Our big negative was the dinging of the elevator each time it stopped on our floor.  This needs to be turned way down.  Goes all night.  We were next to the elevators and I would think if you are further down the hall it wouldn't be an issue. The carpeting and beds have just been replaced and more upgrading is in the works.
Manager Response: Dear Penny,  Having you here with us was so wonderful! It's so great to know that you were able to take full advantage of the convenience our great location offers our guests. Thank you so much for mentioning our excellent service as well! Your comments about noise are understood and we are definitely aware that this is an opportunity for us to grow. Should your travels bring you back to the area in the future, we hope you'll consider staying at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection with us again!

Summary: My dad and I were pleasantly surprised by this hotel. It was a perfect distance to Disneyland, the Garden Walk restaurants, and CVS/walgreens. The room was clean and the beds were SO COMFY! We also loved the little coffee shop and breakfast restaurant in the lobby, and the staff was super nice.
Manager Response: Dear Zoe,  Thank you for your terrific review of your recent visit! We are thrilled to have had the opportunity to provide you and your father with a clean, convenient, and friendly place to stay during your time in Anaheim. It's wonderful that you were able to take full advantage of our convenient location! We appreciate you choosing Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection nd hope you will be back to see us on your next visit to the area. Thank you again and safe travels!

Summary: Comfy beds. Seems they fixed the water pressure in the north tower finally. Parking fee is a little ridiculous.  Friendly staff. Good location..not too long a walk to DL. Recently renovated room.  Cute fun place.
Manager Response: Dear Jon, If you're looking for some cute fun, we are certainly the cutest option around. With our comfy accommodations and stellar staff, you can always expect to have a fantastic experience at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We hope you made plenty of amazing memories at Disneyland. We love to know that we are your go-to destination. It would be an honor to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Decent place and great for the price range
Summary: Clean room, friendly and accommodating staff. Great location. Nice linens on the beds. AC unit was on and off all night and pretty loud. Water pressure was low. we would stay again, but will ask if there are rooms with a quieter AC!
Manager Response: Dear Lannice,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience with us. We are happy to have had the opportunity to provide you with a clean, friendly, and convenient place to stay during your time in Anaheim. You can be certain we'll pass your concerns about the air conditioner and water pressure along to our maintenance team to ensure everything is functioning as it should and that any necessary repairs are made promptly. Take care, and know that we'd be honored to serve you anytime your plans bring you this way.

Summary: My stay here was more than I expected! Front desk was friendly and helpful with early check in and parking. Free cookies for my granddaughter,free adult beverage for me at bedtime and free breakfast for granddaughter in a.m. with purchase of adult meal. Room was clean, beds were comfortable and I definitely felt safe traveling alone with a child. I would stay here again! My new favorite! Granddaughter loved it too.
Manager Response: We were delighted to host you and your granddaughter at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. From clean accommodations to friendly hospitality, we strive to deliver an exceptional stay! On behalf of our team, we hope to have the opportunity to create more memories with you in the future!

Summary: I have stayed here twice in the last month while visiting Disneyland Resort. I am thrilled with the experience I’ve had. The hotel is nice and clean, and the service both times has been fantastic.  The one single downside is staying here….. there is no hot tub. They do have a heated pool, though. I would absolutely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: We strive to be the perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland, so we're thrilled to read your comments. Thank you for highlighting our clean, cozy rooms and top-notch service. We're happy to hear that you enjoy our heated pool, and we appreciate you sharing your desire for an on-site hot tub. Your kind words brighten our day, and we hope that you'll continue to make Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection your first stop when in Anaheim.

Summary: I really enjoyed staying here with my wife. Everything is truly within walking distance, Disneyland, dining, shopping, sightseeing. Busing is available on all four corners of the street. The rooms are modern and the beds are comfortable and pillows are plush. Staff is very friendly and accommodating. Definitely a place to stay for a Disney trip.
Manager Response: What an excellent review to receive! We're delighted that you and your wife enjoyed your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Thank you for spotlighting our prime location, local attractions, comfortable accommodations, and friendly staff. We cannot wait to welcome you back, so please return soon!

Summary: Great place to stay for my son’s SoCal volleyball tournament in January. Walking distance to Disneyland in Anaheim conference Center. Free breakfast in the morning and the staff was very helpful. We will definitely be coming back in June.
Manager Response: Dear Alexia, It was a pleasure hosting you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We're glad our convenient location, tasty breakfast, and friendly staff impressed you. Thank you for the kind review. Please come see us again soon.

Summary: Was able to get an early checkin which was nice. However, the bathtub didn’t drain and the air unit had no heat and it was quite chilly, so they moved us. Housekeeping shares the same elevators and one wasn’t working, so it took forever to get around. It’s a great location, but there are plenty more locally to choose from. I would look elsewhere first.
Manager Response: Your feedback is valuable as it helps us improve. While we're glad our location worked well for your trip, we apologize for any concerns about the bathroom and heat as well as for any issues with the elevator. We'll look into your comments further, and we hope you'll consider staying with us again should you be back in the area.

Summary: The rooms are very comfortable and clean and we loved the lobby décor. The free check-in cocktails were a great touch too.  Unfortunately there were a few issues when we were there. We had to continually get our key cards reset, including one time when we were wet and cold after going in the pool. The first time it happened they said it had something to do with going through all the sensors at Disneyland – but it made no sense to keep happening repeatedly.  Our room was also never cleaned while we were there. We noticed after Day 1 that we were supposed to request that, so we did – and it still was not cleaned.  I also asked for an email receipt when checking out but haven't received it yet (any other hotel this has always been immediate).
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Anaheim. It's wonderful that our comfortable accommodations, complimentary cocktails, and lovely decor were highlights of your time with us. However, we apologize for any inconvenience caused by the mishap with housekeeping. We'll share your remarks with our staff to ensure future visits will be exceptional. In regards to your receipt, if you still have not received the emailed copy, please reach out to hello@hotellulu.com. We trust you had a phenomenal trip to Disneyland, and we hope to serve you again soon.

Summary Heading: The hotel you didn’t know you needed in your life !
Summary: Having this be the first Disney trip with children, I knew planning ahead would be key. I did allllllll the research down to every last detail, to prepare for all the chaos that comes with doing Disney with a 2 year old and infant (yes I am that kind of crazy). This hotel wasn’t talked about a whole lot in the groups I followed which is shocking. I called ahead months in advance to start asking my questions, request a joint room, and learn more about the transportation options. Each time staff was super helpful, and reassuring. By the time the big day arrived, we arrived early and reception staff were great ! They not only ensured we would have a joint room as previously requested, but also helped to get us into our rooms ASAP. The entire space is fresh, Instagram ready with the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing how much you and your family enjoyed your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It is fantastic to see that you found our location convenient for enjoying the local attractions and found our staff to be friendly and helpful. We appreciate your comments on a possible shuttle service and will discuss this with our team as we are always striving to improve our overall guest experience. Please come back and see us again when you are next in the area.

Summary: Great location with lots of amenities.  Wonderful place for families.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  I will stay here every time I visit Disneyland.  So much was in walking distance, but you don't need to leave the hotel for a drink or great breakfast.  Secure parking, great pool, clean room and large bathroom made it very comfortable for our family of four.  Directv, mini-fridge and microwave were appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear Marcus, Wow! What a delightful review! Thank you for all of the wonderful compliments and we couldn't be happier to hear how much you enjoyed your stay. We are thrilled that Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection is now your "go-to" hotel any time you're visiting Disneyland.

Summary: Comfortable, clean, great location highly recommend. Very short walk to Disney, hotel has everything you could need, every staff member we talked to was friendly and helpful. Without a doubt will continue to stay here
Manager Response: Our goal is to make sure we always have high marks on the three "C's" that are so important to all of our guests; clean, comfortable, and convenient accommodations. We are thrilled to know you were impressed with all we have to offer so close to Disneyland and honored that you will be joining us again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary: The room was clean and quiet and in great proximity to Disneyland and restaurants nearby.  The beds were comfortable.  We had a late check-in after midnight and the evening staff was friendly and fast. It wasn't required, but I usually check-out in person for a receipt. The staff was very friendly again.  This is BW Premier, which was overall a good experience and expected value.
Manager Response: Dear Bbharlan, Guest satisfaction is our top priority here at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, and it appears that we hit the mark for you to have an enjoyable stay! Thank you for detailing your experience, and we are pleased that our prime location, quiet accommodations, dedication to cleanliness, and hospitality were all positive aspects of your stay. The next time you are in Anaheim and looking for a hotel that checks all the right boxes, we are confident you will keep us in mind. Safe travels!

Summary: Convenient, Clean, and Courteous staff!!!!!  Very happy with my stay and experience at this Hotel Property!  I have stayed at MANY properties in the Anaheim area, and this hotel was by far my greatest experience. I will definitely stay here again, and recommend to others.
Manager Response: It's so good to know that you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Thank you for spotlighting our dedication to cleanliness and friendly staff. Hosting your stay was the ultimate pleasure, so please return soon for another five-star visit.

Summary: Bad weather but still had a great time nice that hotel was close to Disney parking lot …came back to room often to dry off and change clothes…and head back to park and do it all over again. I hop next door open 24 hours so had late night breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for offering feedback about your recent experience at our hotel. We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and our convenient location close to area theme parks. While we notice the rating of your stay is low, your comments are positive. If you think you may have incorrectly rated your visit with us, we'd appreciate you reposting your review with a new response. Please allow us to host you again should you return to Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel is great, it is not the newest but it was recently renovated and the staff is excellent. It is walking distance to Disneyland, there’s an iHop next to the hotel and a Walgreens in the corner. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Katy,  It brightens our day to know that you had a fantastic experience with us. We always endeavor to exceed expectations, and we're thrilled that our friendly team reflected that. Additionally, we're thrilled that you were able to take advantage of our convenient location! Thank you so much for recommending us to your fellow travelers and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Great Staff, Very accommodating
Summary: Everything was great.  My only complaint would be that the walls are very thin.  You can hear almost everything in the adjacent rooms.  I was told that this is an old building so it does not surprise me.   Re-insulating the walls would be a major undertaking and cost a lot of money so I understand why it wasn't done.  Besides we spent most of our time in Disneyland Resort so it really didn't bother us because we were exhausted by the time we got back to our room.
Manager Response: Dear Bob, Thank you for staying with us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It is awesome to learn that you found our location convenient for enjoying the local attractions and liked our friendly, helpful staff. We hope you will come back and see us again in the future.

Summary: Great stay, great beds, short walk to Disneyland. Leave the hotel, turn left, about one block turn left again, then short walk to Disneyland Toy Story parking lot where you can catch the Disneyland free shuttle.
Manager Response: Your stellar review is everything we always hope for all of our guests. Thank you for highlighting our comfortable beds and prime location so close to Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: I had booked a package thru Disneyland.  Paid for room and tickets up front.  After a fun week at Disneyland with my friends, I checked out of our hotel.  I am a Magic Key holder, so the room was booked under my friend's name, but I paid for the room.  Upon returning home, I find out that they charged me the full price for the room on my credit card the day I checked out.  I didn't understand, as when I checked in I told them that it was prepaid thru Disneyland and they verified that, yes I had a paid package.    Honestly, I was going to give the hotel a decent review, but after being charged over $1000 and 10 days later, I still have no refund, yes very unhappy.  I have also contacted Disney to report this hotel.  I have used Disney Travel a few times in the past and never had
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you encountered these issues, as this is never our intention. We understand your frustration, and we encourage you to reach out to us at hello@hotellulu.com so that we may gather more information and better assist you. Thank you, and we hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: We loved staying here. The Libby was clean and welcoming. Parking was easy and staff were friendly and helpful. Easy walk to the parks. Also close to remote parking for Disney. Room was clean and had tea kettle to make tea or instant coffee. Mini fridge and microwave make it for easy quick mornings.
Manager Response: Offering unbeatable value in a prime location is what we do best at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! Thank you so much for sharing what you enjoyed about your experience with us. Feedback like yours ensures we keep up the great work. The next time you're in Anaheim, we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The only reason I am filling out this survey is because of Savannah at the front desk. I come to Anaheim often, and only chose Hotel Lulu this time due to a last minute change in plans. Upon arriving, Savannah was incredibly gracious and welcoming, and went above and beyond to answer any questions I had and provide helpful information to make my stay better. She also called me shortly after checking in to let me know an electric scooter I had ordered was delivered. Every engagement with her was friendly and inviting. I manage a bank, and if Savannah lived closer, I’d be trying to recruit her away! The hotel is also great! Remodeled lobby and lounge area. Also great proximity to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Haggard, Your kind comments have brightened our day, and you can bet that we will share your recognition of service with Savannah. She truly is an asset to our team. We are thankful that your last-minute plans brought you to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. The next time you are in Anaheim, we hope to be top of your list for accommodations you know you can count on. Until next time!

Summary: Full disclosure, I had planned on staying at the Candy-cane up the street, but they haven’t reopened yet and my reservation was canceled. Someone on Facebook recommended Hotel Lulu as an alternative. It proved to be a great suggestion! Very friendly staff, cheerful lobby decorated for the holidays. Bed was VERY comfortable and I paid extra for a view of fireworks from DL. The view was great. An easy ten minute walk to Disney. My only “complaint “ is that the towels are very thin, but this is a minor issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your thoughts. We're glad our comfortable rooms, friendly staff, and beautiful views helped make your visit memorable. The next time you're in the area, please come back to see us.

Summary: Great remodeled Hotel. Quick check in with a complimentary cocktail offered! The staff had put balloons in our room for my daughters birthday. Our room was super clean and very cute, I loved the electric kettle. The breakfast was great in the restaurant and a good value for the money. The location was great for Disneyland being right by the toy Story lot. It took us 15 minutes to get from the hotel and through security to the main gate. Wonderful friendly staff. Great experience!! Will definitely be staying again!!
Manager Response: Dear Deb, It was a pleasure to host you for your magical birthday celebration! We are elated that you enjoyed your time with us and that our staff, accommodation, dedication to cleanliness, location, and amenities were all highlights of your stay. After a long day at the parks, we know how important rest can be, and we hope that your accommodations left you feeling recharged to continue your adventures. Happy birthday to your daughter, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Came up for Disneyland and everything was great. Only issue was with the breakfast tickets we weee given other than that everything was great. Check in was super easy and fast.  A short 10 minute walk to go Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Kristina, We're happy to hear that you loved our excellent location and our proximity to Disney! We'd be glad to hear your thoughts regarding breakfast, and we hope to welcome you back for another five-star experience in the future.

Summary: Really cute redone hotel. They did a good job making it feel kid friendly and modern, knowing it use to be just an older hotel. Great value, kind staff, yummy food. Walkable to park, only issue we had was a food allergy that the cook was not careful about, but they fixed it when we brought it up and apologized. Would stay again. It was also quite and my ADHD/ASD son was able to sleep because it was quite on the higher floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for making Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection a part of your trip. We're glad our quiet, kid-friendly rooms and tasty food helped make your visit memorable. If your adventures bring you back to town, we'd be happy to host you again.

Summary: The hotel looks cute on the surface, but the room we stayed in had peeling wallpaper, old shower head that had poor water pressure and a LOUD ac/heating unit. There was a cute pour over kettle for INSTANT coffee (seriously???) The blankets and sheets were so old and worn out.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that the upkeep of the property failed to impress you. This is never our intention, and we'll be sure to keep your comments in mind as we continue to make changes for the future. Thank you, and we hope you'll give us another chance soon.

Summary: It was a great location and just walking distance from Disneyland. Staff were so welcoming, didn’t matter what time of day we came in! Hotel lulu will be seeing us again in the near future. Worth it for the price.
Manager Response: We were delighted to welcome you to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, during your recent Disneyland trip. It's wonderful to hear we were able to deliver such a positive experience and that you appreciated our close proximity to Disneyland, as well as the friendly service our team always provided. Thank you for taking the time to share your kind words, and we hope to have the pleasure of your company on another occasion.

Summary: We absolutely loved our stay at the Hotel Lulu. We usually stay at a BW property directly across from the parks just for convenience, but this hotel was far better, more affordable, and the distance from the parks was not a far walk at all. The room was clean (including the carpet/floors), bathroom was nice and big and remodeled, love the soap/shampoo/conditioner dispensers, no sound between walls (only from noisy guests running down the hallway after coming back from the parks, but it was minimal), and INCREDIBLY comfortable beds that made our sleep waaaay better than stays at other hotels. And I can’t believe how low the price is for how awesome the hotel is, AND I get my Best Western points!! It’s our new favorite!!
Manager Response: Dear Jayne, To hear that we have become your new favorite place is music to our ears. Thank you so much for highlighting everything from our clean accommodations to our prime location. We hope you made plenty of amazing memories during your visit. We can't wait to welcome you back to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary: Rooms were clean. Customer service was excellent at check in and check out. Coffee shop service was great and coffee tasted great. Rooms only had hot water carafe with instant coffee which was not good. Bath tub water was slow draining but issue was fixed right away.  We took Lyft to the parks everyday but there is a bus stop right in frint.
Manager Response: On behalf of our Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection team, thank you for being our valued guest! We are pleased that you enjoyed our clean, comfortable accommodations and delicious coffee offerings! Your feedback is also much appreciated as we constantly work hard to improve in the areas that matter most to our guests. Please come back soon for an even better time; we're confident we can impress you and earn that fifth and final star.

Summary: A basic hotel that's an easy walk to Disney and decently priced. Front desk staff was friendly.   A little wear in the tub but nothing that noticeable. The safe was broken but maintenance was able to come in and fix it within the hour.  We needed a mobility scooter for someone in our party and it was able to get delivered there without issue.
Manager Response: Dear Katie, We are happy to know that the easy access to Disneyland, quick service from our staff, and great value helped make your trip to the parks a worthy stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Thank you for your visit, and we hope to see you again the next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This place was so cute and clean!! It was so cozy and the price was perfect compared to all the other ones. This would definitely be my choice to stay again ! One problem I chose the firework veiw room and we didn’t see any :(
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear that our clean accommodations impressed you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection and that you had a great time overall. Please consider coming back to stay with us again later down the road.

Summary: Super nice customer relations person, Ray, greeted me and checked me in a bit early with only sympathy for my long day of travel, none of that hassle about early check-in charges that other hotels sometimes do. I got help with directions from him, as well. Nice room. All good!
Manager Response: Thanks for staying at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Ray strives to impress with his warm hospitality, so we know he will be delighted you remembered him by name! Next time you plan a vacation in Anaheim, we hope you will depend on us again for our comfortable accommodations!

Summary: This past month I got to stay at hotel lulu. The hotel is right across the street from Disneyland. I actually choose to stay here since I was attending a concert at the Honda center which is less than 3 miles away from Hotel Lulu. As soon as I arrived I was greeted and check in by Adan.  The check in process was super easy. They even gave us complementary drinks. The room was super cozy and comfortable. We were able to keep our drinks cold in the fridge with no problem. I already booked my next stay for next month. Thank you Hotel lulu and staff for making me feel safe and comfortable at your hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly, We're so happy to hear that everything from our comfortable accommodations to our prime location impressed you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! Please come back and stay with us again later down the road.

Summary: Very close to Disney, easy walk, nice employees. It was very clean and I felt safe being there. I would definitely stay there again. I enjoyed my stay and so did everyone in my group. Overall a very good hotel
Manager Response: We're thrilled to know that our clean accommodations and prime location impressed you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! Please come back and see us again soon.

Summary: Booked Hotel after such good reviews and closeness to Disneyland , did not disappoint.  Was able to see the fireworks from our bedroom window at 9.30 pm. The hotel staff were so helpful and friendly which is such an asset.  To name two Shannon and Aiden , but all staff were more than helpful. The hotel was clean and we had a kettle and microwave in our room which was such an asset . If ever I went to Anaheim again I would definitely go to Hotel Lulu again
Manager Response: Hosting you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection was indeed a pleasure! From our prime location to our amiable staff and clean, well-equipped rooms, we love to impress. Nothing would delight us more than serving you again, so we hope you have plans to return soon!

Summary Heading: Friendly hotel, great atmosphere, excellent location
Summary: This is my second stay at this hotel for a family Disney trip. The hotel is adorable, has a great pool, an excellent coffee bar, the staff is very friendly, and the location cannot be beat. Such an easy walk to the parks!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to welcome back a repeat guest, and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection once again! We take great pride in our friendly team and plentiful amenities and are pleased that this was reflected in your experience. It's fantastic to know that you were able to take full advantage of our convenient location! Thank you so much for your wonderful review, and we look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: The rooms were super clean and the staff was all amazing ! The Kia at ion is so close to the park you can walk or shuttle on over! You can use the Disney shuttle which is right next door! We will definitely be staying here again
Manager Response: Dear Joy, It was a pleasure to welcome you to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, during your recent stay. We're thrilled to hear you had a great experience and appreciated our clean accommodations and the convenience of our shuttle service, as well as the excellent hospitality our team provides. Thank you for taking the time to share your positive review, and we very much look forward to your return!

Summary: I love staying near Disneyland and I almost didn’t book Hotel Lulu because I wanted to be right across the street. I am so glad I stayed here because the location was just perfect!!! The ART tram picked up right in front of the hotel. But the best part was how clean and comfortable the hotel was. The staff was amazing and so personable. Hotel Lulu is my new favorite hotel and I will only book with them now.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review of Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! It's great to hear that our location was ideal for exploring Disneyland. We're also delighted you enjoyed our warm hospitality, clean, comfortable accommodations, and convenient shuttle. Thanks so much for your enthusiastic compliments, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Had 2 rooms and neither one did the refrigerator work in an when you need to keep insulin cold there is an issue with the fridge which did not even have a freezer so you could keep an ice pack cold that is a big problem
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are incredibly sorry to see that your stay with us was not perfect. The things you have mentioned are not acceptable and will be addressed with diligence. We certainly hope we get a second chance to impress you in the future.

Summary Heading: Clean hotel within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Hotel Lulu was clean and conveniently located.  No shuttle available to Disneyland but about 3 blocks walking distance. Very friendly/helpful front desk staff.  We came in late one night to the restaurant.  It was closed but the lady there got us hot chocolate!  So nice!  No fan in the bathroom so it does get pretty steamy/hot quickly.
Manager Response: Dear Nicole, Thank you for your recent stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection as well as your kind review. We are happy you enjoyed our prime location as well as our clean accommodations. Should your travels bring you back to the area, we hope you choose us for your stay again.

Summary: Front desk was very friendly and informative. Complimentary milano cookies (for kids) and cocktail (for adult) was nice. The room was clean and spacious however, my reservation was for a single king and we ended up with 2 queens. We were on the 4th floor and the room was very warm, even with AC set at 63. It blew cold air, but the vents were pointed up so the rest of the room couldn't cool down. Between the upstairs neighbors, toilets flushing, people next door, and housekeeping, sleep was nearly impossible which made it hard to get rest after a long day at Disney and having to travel the next day. We asked for a window facing disney so we could catch the fireworks show (as advertised) but we could hardly see because the Hilton across the street blocked the view. Parking
Manager Response: We welcome all feedback from our guests, and we thank you for sharing your experience. Our staff appreciates earning your praise for our attention to cleanliness, friendly staff, and complimentary cookies/drinks. Please know if you encounter noise or issues with your room during your stay, our front desk is ready to help find a solution should they be made aware. Nonetheless, we thank you for pointing out where we could have improved your visit, and we hope during your future visit, we can exceed all of your expectations. Come back soon!

Summary: Wonderful!  We decided to give the Lulu a try and were so happy we did! Convenient location, nice rooms, cute decor and a great heated pool area. We would recommend and definitely return !   Lots of restaurants and Walgreens close by.  Did  I mention Friendly staff.  15-20 min walk to Disney.
Manager Response: We’re thrilled to hear about your recent experience with us, and we’re so honored that you recommend us to your fellow travelers! It’s fantastic to know that our comfortable accommodations, relaxing pool, and friendly team helped make your trip a memorable one. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection again soon!

Summary: Only took a few minutes to drive from the Disneyland garage. Easy and quick check in. Very comfy beds. Lovely decor. Yummy breakfast. Will definitely stay again in the future. Next time we’ll definitely use the shuttle to and from the park.
Manager Response: Familiar faces are one of the best compliments we can receive and know that our team would be happy to serve you again. Thank you for your kind praise on our quick check-in, comfortable accommodations, delicious breakfast, and convenient amenities. We look forward to hosting you for your next magical getaway!

Summary: I came to Anaheim just for Disneyland and chose this hotel specifically because it's walking distance to Disneyland and affordable. I read reviews and knew it's just an average hotel and wasn't expecting anything except for a place to sleep overnight and a place to park my car. The parking lot is behind the hotel and it's easy to get in and out. The front desk staff was also really nice and helpful. The room was spacious and ok. The towels were so old and non absorbent. It's like all the cotton has been worn out and should've been trashed years ago. The pool was freezing cold, with a bunch of annoying kids running around and screaming, and parents didn't do anything about it, so it was hard to relax at the pool, but that didn't bother me because I didn't come there to relax at a
Manager Response: Dear Kristen, Thank you for reaching out to us. We are glad that you appreciated our fantastic location and that you had a satisfactory visit overall. That being said, we will be sure to discuss your concerns with the relevant parties to ensure that we are providing the quality experience that we know we are capable of. We appreciate your feedback and hope that you will come back to see us for a better stay soon!

Summary Heading: Watch out for Housekeeping once you leave something, they take it!
Summary: I forgot some of my jewelry in a drawer when I checked out. Called them back as soon as I realized I left it in the nightstand drawer. They told me to call the next morning to talk to that shift supervisor. Called in the morning, front desk says the shift supervisor will return my call. They never called back. I call again, front desk says nothing was found. They didn't ask for my name, a description of what was left behind not sure what to think except they could be hiding something.  I am now noticing they are not even answering my phone calls so I can offer a reward. Please remember all your belongings when you check out.
Manager Response: Dear Glendar, We are sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with us, as it is always our intention to provide great customer service. Please accept our sincerest apologies that we did not live up to your expectations on this occasion. We are thankful that you reached out to share your experience, as your valuable feedback helps us to improve our processes and better serve our guests. On behalf of our entire team, we wish you happy travels ahead.

Summary: The staff was very helpful and we felt secure with the parking lot very secured! This was our first time at this hotel. Hopefully we can sign up for points love it! Beds were comfortable and room was very clean!
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire team here at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, we appreciate the perfect rating and thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Friendly staff, comfortable accommodations, and a dedication to cleanliness are all aspects you can expect when staying with us. We eagerly await your next visit, and we hope you are already making plans to return to Anaheim soon!

Summary: We were welcomed with a complimentary cocktail which was a pleasant surprise and a wonderful first impression.  This set the tone for our stay, which was wonderful.  Excellent front desk service from Natalie, clean room in excellent condition and a quiet stay.  My wedding ring was misplaced and the hotel staff and management was right there to help us look for it! They were all so helpful and caring
Manager Response: Hosting your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection was a pleasure, and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our excellent service and clean, peaceful accommodations. Thank you for being our valued guest, and please come back soon!

Summary Heading: First time at Hotel Lulu...very enjoyable!
Summary: A very good first impression on our first visit here. Lobby was clean, as were the hallways and room. Happy we had a good view to S Harbor Blvd. Very happy there 4 large pillows on each queen bed. The AC worked with a small rattle that was somewhat acceptable. Microwave and refrigerator were nice except we needed a freezer for our ice blocks. Bathroom was very clean and nice clean white towels. The shampoo, conditioner, and body wash bottles that were in the shower needed to be refilled, but we brought our own to use in addition to what was there.
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure to welcome you and your family to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We always endeavor to exceed expectations, and we're thrilled that our clean and comfortable accommodations reflected that. Additionally, your suggestions for areas where we can improve are greatly appreciated as we are always searching for ways to be better! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This is a great hotel. It’s close to the park. It’s pretty much like all the other hotels in the area, but maybe a little on the nicer side. We stayed one night, but we went to the park for two days. So we were able to check out and then store our bags in the car and keep the car in their parking lot for the whole day. The staff was super nice too.
Manager Response: Dear Mattleonardo, Thank you for making our day with your great review and fun headline - "Welcome Drinks"! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and close proximity to the park. We look forward to having you stay with us again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary: Stayed here for one night and thought it worked out great!  The hotel is very close to the Toy Story shuttles which is a plus!  The front desk gentleman was super friendly and helpful.  I would stay here again😊
Manager Response: Your glowing review of your time with us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection is much appreciated. Thank you for highlighting our excellent location and welcoming staff. The next time that you are in the area, we would be honored to host you again.

Summary: We were attending my company's event at Disneyland Hotel and decided to stay at Hotel Lulu since it was really close. We had a wonderful stay. Natalie at the front desk was very polite and helpful. Upon check in we received a complimentary cocktail that was very delicious. Definitely recommend this Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Tony, We're thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable experience during your recent stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It's especially great to know you appreciated the excellent hospitality Natalie provided at the front desk; we will be sure to pass along your kind words! We're also pleased you enjoyed the complimentary cocktail on arrival. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive review and recommendation, and we hope to have the pleasure of your company the next time you're in the area.

Summary: This stay was amazing. Hotel was gorgeous and staff was so friendly. They give you an IPA as you check in. Room was HUGE!!! It was so clean also and nice shower. Best stay I have had this whole trip. Only an 8 minute walk to Disney. Laundry facilities were very clean. Do not overlook this hotel, it is worth it!
Manager Response: Dear Jackie, Thank you for your compliments on our beautiful property and friendly staff! We're glad our location worked well for your trip and that you appreciated our many onsite amenities. If your travels bring you back to the area, please come see us again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The room were clean and comfortable with a great working A/C. I would stay here again due to the convenience of being close to Disneyland Parks and the comfort of the hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Aly, Thank you for the outstanding review of your recent stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We're glad you had a wonderful time with us and that you enjoyed our clean and comfortable accommodations, convenient location close to area theme parks, and friendly and helpful staff. It's the best compliment knowing you'll visit us again when you return to Anaheim, so come back soon!

Summary Heading: Welcoming, clean and close to all your needs
Summary: We were greeted by amazing staff that checked in with our stay every time we passed by. The room was clean, the bed comfortable and the air conditioner worked well during an unseasonably hot week. We had a tasty dinner in the cafe and the staff was very nice. The only complaint would be that the pocket door on the bathroom does not cover the entire doorway so it's not so friendly when traveling with others. The walk to the convention center and Disneyland were quick and easy. It's located next to a CVS for any extra needs during your stay. Keep in mind that the room only has instant coffee, but you can purchase coffee in the lobby or at the cafe. We would definitely stay here again, if only to say hello to Shannon at the front desk.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They did a really nice job renovating the rooms.  Everything was clean and quiet. Great location near Harbor & Katella, easy walk to the parks or the Convention Center.  Loved the welcome drink at check-in, and the soaps/shampoo in the shower were surprisingly luxurious despite being in dispensers.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure hosting you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We're glad our clean, quiet rooms and convenient location impressed you. Thank you for sharing how much you appreciated the welcome beverage and luxurious shower amenities. The next time you're in town, we'd be happy to host you again.

Summary: This hotel truly exceeded my expectations.  The staff is unbelievably kind and helpful, they went out of their way to make sure we had everything we needed.  The room was clean.  Housekeeping is on-request so the days we requested it the rooms were cleaned well.  We asked for more towels and they were delivered in less than 5 minutes.  Super easy walk to the convention center and Disneyland, with a really convenient IHOP and Walgreens literally next door.  HIGHLY recommend this hotel for anyone traveling to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Katie, Wow! What an excellent review to read. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our friendly staff, cozy rooms, and prime location. Earning your recommendation is the greatest compliment, and we cannot wait to see you again. Please come back soon!

Summary Heading: 10 min walk to Disneyland for a great price
Summary: Lulu was in a great location for my friends and I. The walk to Disneyland was less than 15 minutes. We saved on uber/transportation. The hotel was clean itself and the staff was friendly. I would stay here again. Thank you.
Manager Response: A convenient location makes all the difference, and we're glad you could utilize ours for all of your Disney plans. We would love nothing more than to welcome you back to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection in the future, so come and see us again!

Summary: The staff at Hotel LuLu were amazing. They made our Disneyland trip even more magical. Shannon at the front desk was so helpful and we loved that we could check in early before the day in the park. One minor item to be aware of is that there are additional parking fees on top of the parking price (although these are fairly minor). Thanks for an excellent stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this lovely review! Our terrific team strives to make your stay as pleasant as possible, and we're delighted you were impressed with Shannon's attentive service! It's unfortunate if our parking fees were unexpected, but we trust you appreciated the convenience of staying just steps from Disneyland. Should your travels bring you back to the area, we hope you return to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary: We had a 50th Anniversary party at Hotel Lulu this weekend and the service was exceptional. The ballroom was clean and the tables were appropriately spaced out, just as we requested. They had a hand sanitizer station right before the buffet area so our attendees felt very safe. We had absolutely no issue that was not addressed timely and with satisfactory results. We were particulary impressed with how the hotel staff anticipated our needs--constantly coming by the ballroom to check in on us. Our attendees raved about the delicious food and the overall positive attitude of the staff. I have worked in the hospitality industry for 15 years and could not offer any suggestions for improvement. You were all so awesome and we thank you for such a perfect evening!
Manager Response: Dear Jane, It was our pleasure to host your group for your 50th-anniversary party. As you are familiar, service can be a make-or-break moment, and we strive to provide industry-leading hospitality from start to finish. We are delighted to know that you and your team felt our staff could not only meet but exceed all your expectations. Should you need another event space, we would be happy to serve you again!

Summary: Everything was clean, everyone was friendly. Great experience here. When checking in, we were offered a cocktail (complimentary). This stay exceeded my expectations. Definitely will recommend to friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us! We're so glad you enjoyed our friendly staff, complimentary cocktails, and clean accommodations. We appreciate your recommendation. It would be an honor to welcome you back the next time you're in town!

Summary Heading: This hotel leaves us wanting more!
Summary: …more time here! Hotel Lulu is our new favourite place to stay! I extended our stay from 1 night to 3 nights because we were enjoying it so much!
