Comfy beds, great pool, amazing staff and very close to Disney! (short walking distance)   The hotel was an old Red Lion and you would NEVER know it! Best Western acquired it and they have done an incredible job of updating every inch of this space! It’s beautiful, modern, clean and definitely has a boutique hotel feel. This will now be our first choice every time we visit Disneyland or the Anaheim/LA area!
Manager Response: On behalf of our Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection team, we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations, refreshing pool, and friendly staff. It was wonderful hosting your stay, and we hope you come back soon!

Summary: My Family and I have stayed at Lulus now around 4 times. We are from out of town but love to travel and visit not only Anaheim but Los Angeles in general. My Husband and I have two children. They automatically now know Lulus and love staying here. It’s so convenient as it’s close to not only Disneyland CA but to all other great Restaurants, Stores and even beaches. Staff is very Polite, and friendly. Rooms are perfect for my little family. They are spacious, clean, and have a microwave and a fridge in each room which is a plus because we have stayed in previous hotels whom do not offer such appliances. They also give the kids cookies and Adults get a complimentary cocktail upon arrival, Which those are greatly appreciated bonus and Even when we have came to visit family in Los
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie, We are thrilled to have you as a part of the Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection family. It is an honor to continue to provide you with a prime location for your California adventures and top-notch service. Thank you so much for the perfect ratings. We look forward to creating more amazing memories with you at your home away from home.

Summary: me and my family stayed at the hotel Lulu check in was nice quick and easy offered complementary cocktails and cookies for the kids there is an IHOP and Walgreens next-door and the walk to Disneyland is very short upon entering the room it is very clean fresh towels in the restroom it has a mini fridge and a microwave which is always good when you have kids I will definitely recommend this hotel to many others
Manager Response: Dear Anibalm, Thank you so much for the recommendation. To hear that you enjoyed our amazing location and well-equipped accommodations is heartwarming. Anytime you and your kids need another fantastic getaway, count on Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection again to deliver.

Summary: Just 10min walk to Disneyland front gate. Great outside services located at walkin distance: Wallgreens, Starbucks, IHOP, CVS. Our room had a good view of fireworks. Good parking, but wish the didnt charge parking!! Besides that, all good. Its going to be our GO TO hotel for Disney trips!!
Manager Response: Being a part of your wonderful stay is the greatest compliment, and we are thrilled that you had a great time at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It's so good to know that you enjoyed our prime location, local attractions, and the excellent view from your room. Please come back soon for another fantastic time.

Summary: We usually stay at the same hotel every time we travel. At our last day we had a horrible experience. We tried Lulu for the first time and What A Difference! We had an amazing stay! I was pleasantly please and we will return in a few weeks.
Manager Response: We're delighted you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! Thank you for the lovely review. Please come see us again soon.

Summary: Really cute little hotel! Super comfy beds and great staff. We loved how close it was to the Disneyland resort and theme parks. We could walk down really easily. The pool deck was a little dirty, but the rooms were great!
Manager Response: At Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, our goal is to impress all our guests, so we’re happy to hear we succeeded with you! It’s great to know you appreciated our clean accommodations, friendly staff, and of course our prime location so close to Disneyland. Should your travels bring you back to town, please come see us again.

Summary: Booked this hotel for Disneyland trip.  Overall was a great stay.  Rooms were clean and comfortable beds.  Shower water pressure could have been a little better but no biggie.  Great value for money.  Hotel staff was very friendly, helpful and accomadating.
Manager Response: Thank you for making Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection part of your Disney trip! We are pleased to hear you had a comfortable stay, and we hope you enjoyed your time at the park. Please come back and see us again soon!

Summary: I’m a Best Western Diamond Select member & thought I would try this property.  Jasmine & Johnny @ the Front Desk are TERRIFIC & welcoming😍🙏🏻🙏🏻!  Every single staff member is great!  A coffee bar & restaurant on site is nice. Easy walk to the Disney resort!  The room was very clean.  Price is less pricey than other area Hotels.  I will stay here again!
Manager Response: Wow! What a fantastic review. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed everything from our amazing service to our unbeatable location. Thank you so much for the praise. We hope you had a blast checking out Disney, and we can't wait to welcome you back to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable near Disney parks
Summary: The Hotel was clean and bright and the staff was always pleasant and welcoming. The pool is too deep for small children but that's not really the draw for a hotel 0.6 miles away from Disneyland. If you are tired and decided to take a bus back to the hotel it is the number 4. The staff told me it was number three in error.
Manager Response: Dear Lucie, At Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, your comfort is our pleasure! We're so pleased that our accommodations and service made for a five-star experience, and it sounds like our location was a hit as well. All the best until we have the honor of hosting you again!

Summary: Everything about this hotel is amazing. The staff is super friendly, the rooms are clean and the facilities (fitness center and pool) are well maintained.  I would highly recommend this hotel. You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: There is nothing that makes us happier than hearing a guest had such a fabulous stay that they highly recommend us to others! We are thrilled to hear your experience was everything you were expecting and more. Should your travels bring you back to the area, we hope you choose Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection for your stay again.

Summary: So I have had the opportunity to travel and stay at varied hotels locally and internationally. Expectations was very low for this stay. Found Hotel Lulu on various websites and all was fairly decent reviews. The decision to stay here was purely based on the fact that Hotel Lulu had better reviews than some of its competitors with more stars in the same area for less.   Experience: We arrived at around 1am from a last minute Disney trip that we planned the night before. We were greeted by Laura and Anna. They were very welcoming and checking in was an absolute breeze. Got our keys and up to the 8th floor we went for some much needed zzz.   Breakfast was awesome. They literally have an iHop next door and a few more steps is Starbucks with a Walgreens. iHop was packed, the early
Manager Response: Wow! Being a part of your wonderful stay is the greatest compliment, and we are thrilled to hear that you had a fantastic visit. On behalf of our  Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection team, the pleasure of having you was all ours. It would be wonderful to see you again, so please come back soon!

Summary: Stayed 4 nights at the hotel and they only provide room service upon request. We requested it only the third day. We were gone to Disney all day and upon return they hadn’t cleaned our room. So we had dirty towels and sheets and food that smelled the room up. They only compensated us one parking night which I found ridiculous also.
Manager Response: Dear Tyson, Thank you for sharing your constructive feedback. Please accept our apologies for the lapse in service during your stay. This is not a typical experience at our property, and we'll make sure that no missteps are repeated. Despite this, we trust that you appreciated our convenient location near Disneyland. It would be an honor to have another chance to deliver the exceptional visit you deserved.

Summary: Spend the hundred dollars more to stay at another hotel in the area. Our room flooded the first day we were there. Everything was poor quality, and garbage everywhere. Staff did the minimum in service and resolution. Fixtures were broke, no water pressure, no hot water, A/C barely functioned, pool was tiny and over ran, stains everywhere, garbage everywhere, beds were marble slabs. Just not worth the money
Manager Response: We are constantly working hard to provide a high-quality experience for all of our guests, so it is disappointing to hear that we didn't meet your expectations. We will discuss your concerns internally to ensure we meet our high hospitality and cleanliness standards. Your input is appreciated, and we thank you for letting us know where we fell short, as this will enable us to reflect and improve.

Summary: My husband and i stayed for 3 nights during 4th of July weekend. Fair warning for the price breakfast is not included, our room did not lock, the ice machine was broken, no hand sanitizer in dispensers, and the “refrigerator” is actually a cooler that only stays cold for 2 hour periods before you have to press the cold button again. We were comped our breakfast during checkout and then harassed by an employee for asking for a to go container. Other than the one employee during breakfast service was generally pretty good! However for the price you are much better off staying at one of the many other BW hotels.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Guest feedback is always appreciated as we consider it to be a valuable learning opportunity. Please accept our apologies for not providing you with a stay that fits your needs and our own standards. On a positive note, we appreciate you highlighting our delicious offerings. It was a pleasure having you here, and we hope for another opportunity to provide you with the experience you expect and deserve.

Summary: Super nice and helpful staff! LOVED the rooms and hotel decor. Overall wonderful stay for my family. Also in a perfect location. Would definitely stay again and recommend for a Disney weekend stay super close to parks!
Manager Response: Dear Justin, We're so happy to hear you had a great time with us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Our friendly staff and prime location are just some of the reasons guests love to stay with us, so it's delightful to hear you enjoyed them as well. We hope you had a wonderful time in Disneyland as well. The next time you're in the area, please do not hesitate to visit us again.

Summary: The staff at Hotel Lulu were friendly and efficient and remembered us each time we passed. We had no issues during our stay and the hotel was clean and conveniently close to the parks. Comfy beds were great and the room sizes were sufficient.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We know there is nothing better than a great staff and comfortable bed to return to after a busy day, so we are happy you were impressed. Should your travels bring you back to the area, we hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: Great stay.  Location was a short walk to the parks.  Welcome cocktail upon arrival.  Room was nice, beds were comfortable.  A recommendation would be to provide complimentary bottles of water in the room. We will stay here again on our next trip to Disneyland and DCA.
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding review of your recent visit to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We're glad you had a wonderful stay with us and that you enjoyed our excellent location close to area theme parks and comfortable accommodations. Your comments are important to us, and we will use them as we continually work to improve our guests' experience. It's the best compliment knowing you'll spend time with us again when you return to Anaheim, so come back soon!

Summary: The staff was very nice. It was a good pool bar and the pool was nice. It wasn’t too packed. I thought it was very clean and in a perfect area to visit Disney. We checked out a day early but would have loved to stay the full time.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure hosting you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We're glad our clean, convenient accommodations and onsite amenities impressed you. The next time you're in town, please come see us again.

Summary: The location of this hotel is great and the bed was comfortable. Other than that…no coffee maker in the room, no outlet anywhere near the desk..(the lamp that was literally on the desk was unplugged since there was no outlet), I had to work in bed since there was no where to sit that I could be plugged in. The bathroom had a pedestal sink, no countertop and a tiny bookcase next to it that had no room, no fan in the bathroom either. When we asked for a different room with a vanity, we were told that all rooms were the same which was wrong since our friend down the hall had a completely different room then us and we paid the same price. The downstairs lobby looked nice but the guy that was supposed to be able to get make higher end coffees told me he didn’t know how and no one
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. It is great to see that you found our location convenient for enjoying the local area and liked our comfortable bedding. Please know we are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience and will bring your concerns to our team so we can address the issues you have mentioned. We thank you for your feedback and wish you pleasant future travels.

Summary: Staff was super nice and helpful, our room was honestly really clean which I was surprised about that. The location is freaking perfect though and the ihop right next door definitely helps. Right around the corner there’s cvs and Starbucks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, as well as your wonderful review! We are thrilled to know we exceeded your expectations and look forward to having you stay with us again soon.

Summary: Staff is very caring and friendly. A very quick walk to the parks. Located close to restaurants, bars and shopping. Pool is nice and was heated. There are games and a bar out at the pool. We would not hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us! We are glad to know that you appreciated our friendly staff members, as well as our convenient location and fun pool area. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Wow, what a disappointment. The only thing new about this hotel is the name. TV was broken and shower was backed up. We switched rooms and the front desk said they would comp our parking but they did not. The room is outdated. Nothing was changed or updated from when this property was Red Lion. The only reason to stay here is the location across from the convention center. Next time, I will stay at Hilton or Hyatt property.
Manager Response: Dear Juliet, We're saddened to learn you did not enjoy your stay despite our convenient location. Please accept our apologies for any concerns about the condition of the room. We'll look into your comments further, and we hope you'll consider staying with us again during your next trip.

Summary: Refrigerator was on a timer so could not keep items cold for more than 8 hours, no coffee makers in the room just disgusting instant coffee packets, and the coffee shop doesn't even open till 7am.  Outdated common areas and less than standard security measures. Had to get new room keys almost daily as they would deactivate. The beds were comfortable and room was clean. The remote only changes channels if you stood right in front of the tv and only had a handful of channels which wasn't that big of a deal because we were gone over 15 hours a day. I won't be staying here again for the price we paid we could have stayed in a hotel that had coffee maker, fridge, and offered breakfast in a much more updated facility.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you, and we thank you for your feedback. Though we're glad your room was to your satisfaction, it is unfortunate that our amenities left much to be desired. Our team is committed to positive change, so rest assured that we will reflect upon your feedback and seize all opportunities for improvement. We appreciate your input and hope to see you again someday.

Summary Heading: It is a decent place to stay.
Summary: The hotel and room are clean.  The doors do not hang right so you really need to lean into the door to lock it at night.  They have some nice shampoo, conditioner, and body wash but the dispensers are slow unless you push through the opening with your finger--maybe just bring your own--there is no lotion.  The coffee is absolutely dome of the worst stuff I have ever tasted.  Prepare to stop off at the Starbucks next door or pay downstairs at the hotel.  The woman at the front desk and to be one of the most upbeat and friendly people I have seen behind a desk in idk how long.  She was very nice.  They had three busses of teens on senior trip while we were there so the tiny pool was basically unusable.  I teach high school so idk if that makes me more able to handle the kids or
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you and your family stay with us. We are happy to hear you had a good stay, and we appreciate your understanding during our busy season. Thank you for your kind words regarding our amazing staff, and we'd love to welcome you back next time you plan a Disney vacation!

Summary: Very clean and pillows & bed were extremely comfortable. Staff was friendly and accommodating. I liked that you could text them if you needed anything. The walk to the parks was great too, not that far. The only downside was next door people were loud. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, to host your recent visit. It's wonderful to hear we were able to deliver a positive experience and you appreciated our clean and comfortable accommodations, as well as the friendly hospitality our team provided. However, we're sorry for any noise disturbance you encountered from a neighboring room; we encourage our guests to notify our front desk team of any issues like this so we can find a solution and ensure you have an enjoyable stay. We're grateful for your kind comments and very much look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Enjoyed our stay Excellent customer service
Summary: Liked the fact that staff with send you a text message to check in with you to see how your stay is going or if you need anything. Will definitely be recommending and staying here again for any future getaways.
Manager Response: Dear Carolin, Our amazing staff works hard to ensure all our guests feel welcome and will be glad you appreciated their exceptional service. It will be a pleasure hosting you again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary: We loved the music in the lobby, check in was smooth and the decor was cute.  Our family loved the pool area with music playing and water toys.  We also enjoyed the fire pits so some of us could sit out and still enjoy the atmosphere.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It is fantastic to hear that you were able to utilize some of our excellent amenities and that your check-in process was smooth. We look forward to seeing you again when you are next in Anaheim.

Summary: The toilet seat wasn’t connected all the way so you would slide off when you sat down. It also was so loud when you flushed that you could hear the rooms next to you flush. The bath tub was clogged. There was some weird dent in the bathtub too. There’s no dressers for clothes only a tiny closet.
Manager Response: Dear Sabrina, Thank you for taking the time to share your valuable comments regarding your recent visit. While we're pleased you had an agreeable experience, we're sorry to hear that we fell short of meeting all of your expectations. Please accept our apologies for any issues you had with the toilet and the bathtub in your room; we will address this with our maintenance team to ensure these issues are resolved. We encourage our guests to reach out to our front desk team with any problems that may occur so we can find a solution as soon as possible. Your feedback is important as we continually strive to provide our guests with a positive experience. We hope to have the opportunity to impress you the next time you're in the area.

Summary: The only positive comment I can make is because of the gentleman who first assisted us when we arrived at the hotel. I believe his name is Adan as that’s who I was receiving text from after checking in. Adan was nothing short of AMAZING. He gave us the complimentary drink and cookies for the kids. He made us laugh, he had a great personality and followed up to make sure everything was well with our stay. We didn’t have the card we made the reservation with physically because it was lost but we had it on the app.he was able to use that without issue. However, all the other experiences we had (with the exception of how nice the hotel was) were nothing short of the worst I’ve experienced. First, we decided that we wanted to come a day earlier. The hotel told us they couldn’t modify
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to let us know about your experience. Unfortunately, third-party reservation sites do not sync appropriately with our system, which can cause the issues you encounter with making reservation alterations. We apologize for any inconvenience in this regard, as well as for the oversight in service you received—this is not typical of the quality we aim to provide, and we hope you give us another chance to impress you with the warm hospitality we aim to deliver.

Summary: This was a central location for Disney. The rooms were small and the bathrooms tiny. The shower lacked pressure. Requests for towels and bins emptied could be done everyday. It wasn't as fantastic as I expected but did the job. Beds were comfy. We loved that the Disney bus stopped out the front and token transport app you could purchase through.
Manager Response: Dear Katherine, Thank you for choosing our property for your accommodations. Located just steps from Disneyland, we're pleased you appreciated our convenient location. However, we apologize for the lack of water pressure, and we'll pass along your feedback to our operations team. Despite this, it's great you loved our comfortable bed after a long and busy day at the theme park. We hope to see you again next time you vacation in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Well kept hotel equidistant Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: BW's Hotel Lulu was a great value while attending the Star Wars Celebration at the Anaheim Convention Center. 12 - 15 minute easy walk, and the same to Disneyland. Parking is extra but in a convenient gated lot surrounding the hotel. Three minute walk to large drug stores with many incidentals and snacks, and there's a steakhouse and an IHOP v close by in addition to the hotels restaurant and pool bar.
Manager Response: Wow! This is just a great review! With all the hard work we put in, it's comments like these that make it all worth it! Thank you so much, and we can't wait to see you again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary: Friendly and knowledgeable.  Anything I needed staff took care of at any hour.  They even changed the channel on the TV in the lobby to watch a brand new series on a channel unavailable in my room.  Reasonable parking.  Very near the convention center. Take the Toy Story shuttle to Disneyland which is just around the corner.  IHOP restaurant right next door.
Manager Response: Your thoughtful review of your recent stay with us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection is much appreciated. We are thrilled that our spirit of service shined through and that our convenient location was perfect for your needs. Thank you for your thoughtful review, and we hope that you will come back to see us again soon!

Summary: Other than being on the second floor with literally no view in the room, the experience was great. Courteous staff members and centrally located in the Anaheim resort area, especially if you're attending an event at the convention center. Rooms could use some updating but the theming is cute.
Manager Response: Our prime location and caring staff are part of the quality that our guests can depend on at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! Thank you for spotlighting these aspects, as well as for sharing some areas of opportunity. We look forward to making your next stay even more enjoyable!

Summary Heading: Do Not Stay at this Hotel
Summary: Unfortunately, I'm unbale to rate this hotel a -1 star. For starters i did not have hot water my first 2 days. There was check in issue with my room two days into my stay. My experience at this hotel was horrible.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing feedback about your recent experience at our hotel. We are sorry you were disappointed with your stay. Guests are encouraged to notify us of any issues they encounter so we may assist them, and we apologize if we were unaware of the initial lack of hot water in your room. Your comments are important to us, and we will use them as we continually work to improve our facility and service. Given another opportunity, we hope we can host you for the visit you expected.

Summary: Front desk staff were unkempt, no name badges and not interested in solving guest issues. Fitness center equipment needs maintenance and no hand sanitizer or sanitizing wipes to be found. Pool area not kept up with. Beds and pillows were comfortable but rooms had maintenance issues.
Manager Response: Dear Gerrie, Thank you for sharing feedback about your recent stay at our hotel. We're sorry you were disappointed with your experience. While not a typical occurrence for our guests, your comments are important to us as we continually work to improve our service and facility. Given another opportunity, we hope we could host you for the visit you expected.

Summary Heading: First time staying at a Best Western hotel.
Summary: This was my first time staying at a Best Western hotel and it was part of their premier collection. Hotel Lulu not only met my expectations, they exceeded them. Hotel Lulu is a hip hotel with friendly staff that makes it their mission to make you feel right at home.
Manager Response: Our goal is to impress everyone who stays at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, so we're happy to hear we succeeded with you! It's great to know that our amazing staff and hip property helped make your visit memorable. If your adventures bring you back to the area, please come see us again.

Summary: Very clean, great hotel with an awesome vibe upon entering. About 1/2 mile to Disney gates, great location. Very accommodating for our last minute reservation at 10pm after a bad experience at a nearby hotel.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We truly appreciate your kind words about our dedication to cleanliness and convenient location to Disney. Thank you so much. It is our hope that we will be able to have another opportunity to provide you with an impressive experience in the future!

Summary: Staff went above and beyond to make our trip exciting and memorable. We even were given a custom breakfast at the quick counter when they were out of our original choice! Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection to host your recent stay. It's wonderful to hear we were able to deliver an enjoyable and memorable experience, and you appreciated the excellent hospitality our team provides, as well as had the opportunity to try our delicious breakfast menu. We're grateful for your positive review, and we hope to have the pleasure of your company again soon.

Summary: Our stay at Hotel Lulu was amazing, we stayed there 3 nights for our trip to Disneyland. Hotel staff was so nice and helpful, Toy Story parking is right next to the hotel so we used it every day, though walking is close but we wanted to save time going through security at the parking lot. Beds were super comfortable, clean rooms, 7-11, Ihop, starbucks, Blaze pizza and more restaurants next to the hotel. Hiéndale we were very comfortable and happy with our stay. Thank you Hotel Lulu, I always recommend this hotel whenever I can, always recommend to Disney travelers on Disney groups, posted some stories on instagram and had some friends and family stay there already and they loved it as well!! You won’t regret booking Hotel Lulu my friends! I am staying there again by the end of
Manager Response: Dear Alexa,  It brightens our day to know that you had a fantastic stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We always endeavor to exceed expectations, and we're thrilled that our convenient location, comfortable accommodations, and friendly team reflected that. Thank you so much for your recommendations, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Hotel LuLu has become one of my top hotels in the Disneyland area. Rooms are clean, staff is friendly and helpful, and it's a quick walk to the parks. This is a no frills hotel, but I had everything I needed and the price was right. I highly recommend this place for a clean comfortable room to crash in at the end of those long Disney days.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure hosting you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We are happy to have had the opportunity to provide you with a clean, friendly, and well-priced place to stay while you were visiting Disneyland. Thank you so much for recommending us to your fellow travelers, and we look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great Value, be aware of Views
Summary: Upon early arrival, we where allowed for early checkin as we had to drive to East L.A When we returned I noticed the views from window was the wall from building next door and pipes and Ducts system, definitely not what was the room description during the booking. After talking to receptionist, he kindly moved us to a better room with amazing views. Overall experience was great, just be aware the room you get is not the first 3 floors in the North Building
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We are proud to deliver great value to our guests, so we are delighted that you found your experience to be well priced. We hope you will visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Great price for a great hotel
Summary: I decided to check this hotel out since it’s priced right and close to Disneyland. It was within walking distance to Disneyland and the Garden Walk. The towels and sheets were nice and everything was clean.
Manager Response: Dear Frank, We take pride in offering clean, convenient accommodations at an affordable rate, so we're glad you appreciated our efforts. Thank you for the lovely review. Please come see us again soon at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary: I had a wonderful experience at hotel Lulu I go to a lot of best westerns and this is one of the best ones I highly recommend you stay in here if you’re going to Disneyland or anywhere in Los Angeles area it’s very clean comfortable and they have a closet with a door and a great view inconvenient walking distance to Disneyland land as well and food nearby the staff is extremely nice and I know and they have a really nice heated pool and a bar area with a restaurant and convenient parking and a good elevator. Being able to text the front desk for your needs was also extremely convenient. The purple cocktail was amazingly tasty. I would definitely stay here again every time I come back to Disneyland in Los Angeles which is a few times a month. Thank you for the amazing experience
Manager Response: Our goal is to impress everyone who stays at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, so we're happy to hear we succeeded with you! It's great to know that our clean, comfortable rooms and convenient location added to your experience. Our friendly staff will also be glad you felt welcome while you were here. The next time you're in town, we'd be proud to host you again.

Summary: When we first arrived, there was a foul egg/wet carpet odor on the fourth floor. The room offered instant coffee and there was no suitcase stand in the room. The toilet didn’t work properly, it took three attempts to flush all the way. The bar didn’t open until 4:30 pm each day and at the pool there is no hot tub/spa. The rooms are very small and this is an older hotel. We had two queen beds for three adults. It was a tight squeeze. We were better off booking a cheaper hotel, like the Clarion. I think this is the same quality as the Clarion with a higher price point. I need to note, my grievances are with the property only, the staff was very nice and friendly. The location was also a plus. Walgreens, CVS, and restaurants were very close. It’s a bit a long walk to the Disney
Manager Response: We appreciated the opportunity to host you as our valued guest. It's terrific you enjoyed our friendly team members, as we strive to make our travelers feel right at home. However, we regret that certain aspects of your stay fell short of your expectations. It's unfortunate if you were disappointed not having a hot tub; please know that our amenities are published online so they can be reviewed before arrival. We take pride in keeping our facilities immaculately clean, so we will immediately research and swiftly address your odor issue. Thank you for mentioning our convenient location in Anaheim, just two blocks away from all the fun at Disneyland. We hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary Heading: Great Stay and Convenient to Conventions and Disney
Summary: Stay on the 1st floor if possible. The pool bar is cool. I hop is beside. Walgreens & CVS is near the hotel. There is Garden Walk has All kinds of restaurants and things to do. Plus walk to disney and the convention center.
Manager Response: We're delighted you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, and that our location worked well for your trip. Thank you for the lovely review. Please come see us again soon.

Summary: Very impressed with the Managment here. I was not expecting above and beyond and that’s what I got! Blew my mind to be honest, would recommend 10/10 and so close to Disney I went for my birthday can’t wait to go back
Manager Response: Happy belated birthday! We love to see that you had a blast celebrating your special day. Thank you so much for highlighting our unbeatable location and fantastic staff. Michael is amazing, and we are so lucky to have him. He will be honored to be recognized for his stellar service. We look forward to welcoming you back again to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary: We stay here most rips to Disneyland.  Walking distance to the park & theres also CVS close by for snack & water needs.   A Starbucks on your way to the park to beat the downtown Disney location mad morning rush.
Manager Response: If traveling to Disneyland, there's no better place to stay than Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We love to see that our convenient location made checking out all the nearby attractions much easier. Thank you so much for the review. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Premier means you pay more but get less
Summary: This best western was unlike any other best western I’ve stayed at. The room quality was the same. Double queen beds and a bathroom. Super small fridge, NO free breakfast! And they charged more for parking than any other hotel around us. I would not recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your thoughts. We're glad our comfortable rooms were what you were expecting. However, we apologize for any disappointment with the included amenities, and we'll keep your comments in mind. Should you be in the area again, please consider coming back to see us.

Summary: From the second we walked in, we were greeted and and music was turned up so it felt like a party! Then we got asked if we wanted some complementary drinks.. hell yeah! They were yummy too! The staff was so friendly and helpful as well. The rooms were clean and the beds and pillows were comfy. Plus it’s So close to Disney that we were able to come back during our stay at Disney to rest our feet at the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was beautiful very clean very easy to get to and from the staff was super friendly and inviting helped me with any questions I had made the stay very relaxing and the room was gorgeous very spacious and very clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is in the perfect location walking distance to pharmacy stores and plenty of restaurants right outside the hotel. Rooms are clean and front desk staff was nice and helpful. Will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall kids and I loved the room and the location, close walk to Disneyland.. pool was a bit crowded but managed to swim for a sec. The shower pressure was a bit low for my liking. Upon checking out gather my stuff my youngest son brought and eyelash curler and sunglasses that were not ours, so disappointed I didn’t notice this earlier we spent all day/ night at Disneyland.. gotta do a better job a cleaning but overall we’d definitely would be coming back
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our AirBNB was an unexpected bust and we needed to make another plan quickly. LuLu saved the day for us. The rooms were reasonable and spacious. Trying to save money on the cost of our trip we packed our lunches each day. The fridges worked great for this and there was enough counter space to get lunches and breakfasts set up. The beds were comfortable and the heat and air worked as expected. Near the IHOP and other moderately priced dinner spots open late to accommodate the after Disney crowd.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, clean and nice colors
Summary: Family trip to Disneyland. Has a great location, friendly staff and nice decorated. The hotel is a bit old but clean. The WiFi y very poor, you should offer something better. limited services in general like food service. The rooms are clean and comfortable but limited in spaces for families of 4.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Happy Visit Near the Happiest Place on Earth!
Summary: The staff was welcoming on arrival, and were accommodating on us arriving early. We were lucky to get a complimentary happy hour cocktail, and it was cute and on trend for the hotel! We loved the pool area, and the charming décor inside and out of the shared spaces. The room was clean, and had a fridge, microwave, and quite the snazzy tea kettle. I was able to get a great deal on the room, which made the stay even better. Hotel Lulu was an easy walk to the park, and other food/conveniences. We hope to stay again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Toilet was so loud when you flushed. Water splashed back. Disgusting. Bathroom was disgusting. Old and doesn’t seem updated. Cracks in tub and tub was extremely discolored. Bed sheets smelled like it hadn’t been washed. Television remote didn’t work. Stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved the close proximoity to the Parks, Downtown Disney, resturants & even Walgreens. Asked for a room facing the fireworks as we had a Toddler and didnt know if she would play out before fireworks & were accomodated. The toddler did play out - actually got sick at the park & we had to stay another day. They made sure we could keep our same room & checked back frequently inquiring about the baby & offering to help in any way.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at this hotel and will go back again! The theme was lovely and the front desk service was sublime.   Ramiro was exceptionally helpful in keeping clothing  items I left behind in the room. He was exceptionally curious and kind, the staff service here was excellent!   I look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed our stay it is a great value hotel.  We didn't need many amenities as we were at the park all day.  I would recommend this hotel to any family that is looking for a nice clean place to stay and enjoy the Disney Land experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Front desk staff was exceptional. Great value and great location, short walk to Disneyland.  Coffee and breakfast and bar on site for super convenience. We will stay again! Great place for family to stay too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stay was good and quiet no complaints rooms were clean and staff was very helpful with anything that was needed. Pool is heated but no jacuzzi fire pits were a nice touch after swimming at night. IHOP and 24hr Walgreens is one minute walk and has everything and anything you need next door and good selection of Disney stuff
Manager Response: none

Summary: The check-in was a breeze, the room was exceptionally clean, and the bed was like the one I sleep at my home. I went out with the light and woke up the next morning, rested and ready to go to Disneyland, after visiting California Adventure the prior day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is great! It is a 10 min walk to the Disney Parks. You are also in walking distance to restaurants and shops. Staff was great. We were allowed to check in at 2pm because our room was available. Check in is 4pm. So we got lucky. The room is a standard room with a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker and a safe. I thought this place was great for the night we stayed. We really just used it to rest, shower and sleep for the night. We headed to Disneyland the next morning. The were some paint spots on the wall. I didn't think it was a big deal. Overall, Everything is great!
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie, Thank you for choosing Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Our fantastic location within walking distance of Disneyland makes us a desirable choice with travelers to Anaheim! We're delighted we were able to accommodate your early arrival, and we hope you had a memorable visit to Disney. Should your adventures bring you back to town, we hope you will stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Charged me for a room and refused to give it to me with small children who needed a place to sleep.
Summary: My family have a beyond difficult travel day. Flight cancelled hour before take off. We had to rebook everything was on the phone fixing car and flight still was going to cost hundreds more, it was awful. Then our new flight is late at night and then delayed 3 hours. We finally got into Anaheim at 4am crying small children, no sleep, the worst day. Hotel Lulu says not only do they not have our room for us but they don’t have a room for the next three days as was our reservation and THEY are going to charge us for a night as they send my family out the door with no place to go. We should have called, they said. No mercy. Pure savages. So we had to go pay for that same night again somewhere else after driving to three different places, where they would charge us and give us a
Manager Response: All comments are helpful, and we value your constructive input. We know how stressful traveling can be, and we are very sorry to hear about your experience. We do strive to make our late-arrival policies clear, and we are sorry to hear that these may have caused some trouble for you. Thank you, and we wish you all the best.

Summary: Room was dirty floor and sheets and bathroom. Finger nail clippings  and hair on the floor and in the sheets and gray hair on shower wall stuck to it. Safe was not working and The Room door was jamm up
Manager Response: All comments are helpful, and we value your constructive input. Providing clean accommodations is very important for us, and we are sorry to hear about your concerns on this occasion. Our team will be notified of these matters as we work to uphold our standards. Thank you, and we wish you all the best in your future travels.

Summary: I was skeptical due to mixed reviews, but decided to take a chance on Hotel Lulu anyway.  Wow was I surprised! It was clean and updated. The beds were comfortable. It was a fantastic experience. Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you so much for all the kind words, and we're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our clean, comfortable accommodations. The next time you find yourself in the Anaheim area, we hope you'll once again choose Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection for all your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: DO NOT stay here if you like to sleep!
Summary: Ok, well when you make a definitive request immediately upon check in that you would like to be away from an elevator at a Disney hotel you’d think that would be simple enough.  I had read the many reviews complaining of the PAPER THIN walls at this location. Being a Disney Annual Passport holder I know the AM routines of families. We stay at Disney until midnight and didn’t want to have to deal with screaming children at Dawn running in hallways.   Despite my request, we were placed directly adjacent to the elevator. I hoped for the best and tried to be a good guest.   Morning came like a circus and sleep was a joke. You might as well park a tent on the sidewalk on Harbor Blvd.   The biggest disappointment was this was my daughters 14th bday. We only asked one thing. It’s a big
Manager Response: Dear Aaron, Thank you for taking the time to share your concerns with us. We do our best to honor all requests for specific room locations and apologize wholeheartedly for being unable to accommodate your request at the time. It's was never our intention to appear uncaring about your situation, and we regret having given you that impression. Please know we're here to address any disturbances when notified. It's our hope that your daughter otherwise had a wonderful birthday. We value your input and wish you safe and pleasant travels.

Summary: Overall this hotel was great. Accessable from parking lot to rooms and extremely close to Disney! The staff was able to do early check-in which made our stay that much better! The room was clean and well kept. The water pressure was great! Wish we stayed more nights!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure hosting you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We're glad our proximity to Disney was ideal for your trip and that our attention to cleanliness and service impressed you. Please come see us again the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Rude employees. Cracks in the sink. Everything seems dark and dirty. The beds were horrid. The hotel is loud, you can hear every other room. You can stay in a nicer hotel for the same price. Don’t go here.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda, While we appreciate the perfect rating, this is not indicative of the quality experience we wish to provide. Rest assured that we will discuss your comments to ensure that our accommodations are reflective of the high standards that we have in place. We apologize if we fell short during your visit. Thank you for sharing.

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights for a short Disneyland trip. The staff were friendly and helpful upon check in. There was follow up via text message regarding our stay during its duration. The rooms are comfortable and clean. There was a mild issue with a partially broken door on the mini fridge making it difficult to open. Not really a big deal. There is a fair amount of room to room noise. The best part of staying here was being within walking distance of the Disney Parks (~0.25 mile). The hotel will let you park on the day of arrival and explore the parks before checking in without an additional charge (parking is $25/night). They allow the same service on the date of check out so we got to park there while visiting the parks for a third day. All in all a very nice stay!
Manager Response: Dear Brad, There is no better way to explore Disneyland than by staying at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Our stellar location makes it much easier to check out all the attractions, and we hope you made plenty of amazing memories on your adventures. Thank you so much for highlighting our comfy rooms and fantastic staff. Anytime you need another remarkable getaway, count on us again to deliver.

Summary: I had a wonderful stay at Hotel Lulu during my trip to Disneyland recently. The room was clean and comfortable - LOVED the bed!!! Claudia (I believe that was her name) was super helpful checking me in, and then on my check-out day the guy (I forgot his name - but he was nice as well) took my key cards and stored my bags (they will do that on arrival day if your room is not yet ready and departure day if you have a late flight) and said he'd email me the receipt. Well, it showed a balance of over $600 even though I had pre-paid through a Disneyland package. I asked Claudia (again, I think that was her name - the same woman who checked me in) about it and she took the time to check it and print out a receipt showing no extra charges. She said the system had gone down earlier and
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review of your recent stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It's good to know you had a wonderful visit with us and enjoyed our clean and comfortable accommodations and exceptional service. You can be certain we will share your kind words with Claudia and our front desk team. Your recommendation to fellow travelers is a great compliment. We'll look forward to hosting you again when you return to Anaheim. Come back soon!

Summary: Good price and good location. Walking distance to Disneyland. Disneyland shuttle bus service at doorstep. Close to restaurants. Excellent front desk services and rooms. Decent amenities and reception area.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure hosting you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We're glad our location was ideal for your trip and that you felt welcome while you were here. The next time you're in town, please come see us again.

Summary: The bathroom was disgusting. There was hair all over the bathroom floor when we arrived. There was also pee on the toilet seat.. You could tell there had not been a very deep clean beforehand. Felt like bugs would bite my boyfriend and I in the bed. We also were placed right next to the elevator and there was a connecting room door in our room. It was so easy to hear the people next door that at one point they sneezed and I said bless you and we all laughed. The staff was nice and it was close to Disneyland. Those are the only positives. Listen to the reviews given by other people. Too dirty of a room to enjoy our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jules, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your visit. It is awesome to see that you found our location convenient for enjoying the local attractions and liked our friendly guest service. Please know there is always a member of our team available to assist you with any issues you may encounter and facilitate a room change if available. We hope you will allow us another opportunity to host you in the future; we want to go above and beyond your expectations.

Summary Heading: Hop, skip anda jump from the happiest place on earth
Summary: Location, location, location. The Disney parking spot was even further than the hotel. You don't need a rental car because Disney,  stores and restaurants are all within  walking distance. Plus, great people manning the front desk.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, and we're ecstatic you were impressed! We're so happy you enjoyed our ideal location and wonderful staff. Thank you for your kind review, and we hope you'll choose us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Bed and sheets comfy. Feather pillows a bit bulky. No drawers. House keeping upon request. No complimentary breakfast. Only one elevator working. Tubs slippery use mat. Needs an updated coffee pot. Room size decent. Make sure you pull dirt closed all the way.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback on your recent visit. We are sorry you only found your stay adequate as we always strive to provide our guests with an exemplary experience. It is our hope you will return in the future so we can give you the experience you expected and deserve.

Summary: This is an average motel. I’m not sure what is premier about it unless it is in reference to the high parking cost of $25/night. The sink drains slowly so it’s gross when you’re washing your face or brushing teeth and the dirty water splashes back up at you. The fridge doesn’t work well, so don’t store milk or yogurt, as it’s pretty questionable. It’s tiny too. There’s also no luggage rack to put your suitcase on.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We regret hearing about the aspects that fell short of your expectations. Next time, please let us know about any maintenance issues with your room so our team can assist while you're here. We appreciate the suggestion about the luggage rack and will pass it along to our team. We know we can do better and hope you will give us another opportunity to prove it.

Summary: We loved Hotel Lulu!! Great pool, clean rooms, excellent location and friendly staff!! We were very pleasantly surprised at how awesome the hotel was! We would definitely come back! The hotel had a pool bar as well- yay!!!
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth. Your enthusiastic praise of Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection made our day! It's great to hear our proximity to local attractions was convenient for you. We're also delighted you loved our friendly hospitality, wonderful pool area, and clean accommodations. Many thanks for your outstanding review, and we look forward to your return!

Summary: After reading all the horrible reviews I was very scared to stay here especially because people talk about their poor customer service. I took the risk and I was glad I did I had an amazing experience. From walking into the hotel and having an amazing experience with the check in desk to having the best time at the bar.... CONRAD the bartender is the best... you need to stop by and see him at the bar ....
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We agree there is nothing better than a great staff to make your visit memorable, and we know Conrad will be thrilled to hear he was able to make your stay special. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This trip was for my daughters birthday. We went to Disneyland. The hotel was so accommodating! They let us check in a little early, had drinks in our room for us, and they knew we had children so they made sure to give extra pillows. House keeping was fantastic and fast! The list goes on. Thank you best western
Manager Response: Firstly, happy birthday to your daughter! The pleasure was all ours to play a small role in her big celebration, and we're thrilled we made her getaway one to remember. Our team would love nothing more than to see you again when you return to Anaheim. Thanks so much for choosing us!

Summary Heading: Poor experience, not work it with so many other options. It’s one of the cheaper ones for a reason.
Summary: Rooms are horribly unsoundproofed with peeling wallpaper. You have to specifically call and request room service so if you’re at Disney all day.. don’t forget. Oh but they don’t tell you that either. They have Intelligencia coffee which is an awesome brand but no working coffee machine to get you any. The rooms feel like an old repurposed institutional building. It’s not worth the cost. Pay a little extra to be more satisfied somewhere else, there’s plenty of options.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us your valuable feedback. We hope you found our location convenient for your needs. Please accept our sincere apologies that your stay did not meet your expectations. We want to provide every guest with a clean, comfortable stay and will be communicating your concerns to our team. All the best in your future travels.

Summary: I was skeptical to stay at this hotel due to some of the reviews on Google. I'm not a picky hotel person, but I do expect rooms to be clean. Our hotel room was clean and the beds were very comfortable. The staff was wonderful. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: It was truly a pleasure to welcome you to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection during your recent visit. We're thrilled to hear that you had such an enjoyable experience and appreciated our clean and comfortable accommodations, as well as the excellent hospitality our team provides. We consider it a great compliment that you wish to return! Thank you for taking the time to share your positive review and we hope to host you again soon!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney but not worth it
Summary: Air conditioning  in room did not work. Front desk stated they couldn’t move us to a new room as the hotel was sold out. They refunded our parking fee only. No hot water, and poor water pressure. Close proximity to Disney doesn’t make up for everything else.
Manager Response: We appreciated the opportunity to host your trip to Anaheim. While we're glad you appreciated our close proximity to Disneyland, we're saddened to hear about the issues with your room. Please know this is never the experience we want our guests to have. Our maintenance team will be addressing the A/C problem, and we'll look into your comments further to ensure future visits are even better. Should you travel back to our area, we hope to have a second chance to change your perceptions.

Summary: Clean, calm , friendly environment. Walking distance to Disneyland, Starbucks, and many restaurants. Rooms were very clean, comfortable bed, quiet and relaxing environment.  Staff is very friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: We were happy to provide you with clean, quiet accommodations, and we're glad our location was ideal for your visit. Our friendly staff will also be glad you felt welcome while you were here. If your adventures bring you back to the area, please come see us again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary: If you’re visiting any of the Disney parks, this hotel is highly recommended. Not only is it a reasonable walking distance to the parks, but also walking distance from many restaurants and convenience stores. Some rooms also have views of the Disneyland fireworks show. Hotel staff was very friendly and hotel was clean and followed Covid regulations, and my family felt very safe. Upon checking in, you get complimentary cocktails for every 21+ adult and slushies for every under age child. The rooms were equipped with all the necessary things you need traveling with children; mini fridge, microwave, hot water kettle (with instant coffee provided) and big dispensers of shampoo and conditioner and body wash. The AC wasn’t too noisy or loud when turning on and off, it was a soothing
Manager Response: Your enthusiastic recommendation of Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection made our day! We're happy our proximity to Disneyland and restaurants was convenient. It's also wonderful that you loved our warm hospitality, clean, comfortable, well-appointed accommodations, and attention to recommended safety guidelines. Thanks so much for your outstanding review, and we hope you'll visit us again!

Summary: Hotel Lulu is a great place to stay for a Disney trip.  There is a little coffee bar in the lounge or a Starbuck next door.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  The staff at the front desk were helpful and friendly.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We would be honored to welcome you back for another magical getaway! Our team hopes you had a blast at Disney, and we thank you for spotlighting some of our refreshing amenities, along with our clean, comfy rooms and welcoming hospitality. On your next visit to Anaheim, we look forward to seeing you!

Summary: We took a last minute trip to Disneyland, and were pleasantly surprised by Hotel Lulu. It's half mile from the main gate, the room was spacious and very clean. IHOP and Starbucks are next door, and there is an Anaheim Resort Transit stop right outside the front door!
Manager Response: Dear Andrea, We're so happy to hear you enjoyed your time at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection and that our convenient location near Disneyland was perfect for your needs. Please come back and see us again soon!

Summary: The lobby cleanliness & staff were great. Room was big, bathroom is also big, could use some help. Showerhead sucked and water pressure was not that great. Then we almost got charged for coffee we did not get.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us. While we are sorry to hear about any concerns you may have had with our bathroom, as well as any misunderstanding that may have occurred with your billing,  we are happy that our spotless and spacious accommodations impressed you! Our team will be sure to review all of your feedback as we continue to improve, and we hope that you will allow us another opportunity to exceed your expectations down the line.

Summary: The update on this hotel was decent! Lobby area looks great, rooms are soso, but remember the buildings are old and they can only do so much in refurbishment! Pool area was nice abd we didn’t make use of the bar area but they offer adult beverages and kids slushees. Cafe area was helpful for when we needed milk/coffee and snacks but it is also right next to IHOP, Walgreens and Starbucks so super convenient! Walk to the parks was a little longer than we are used to but not bad (same distance as park overflow parking). My only complaint was that the showers took a little long to heat and I felt guilty wasting water. Appreciated that staff was always masked (even when they were walking to back areas when we were at the pool). Overall had a great stay and will be adding this hotel
Manager Response: Dear Maria, Wow! Thank you so much for your review of your visit to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, and we're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our prime location, as well as our tasty food. We'll be sure to pass your comments along to Claudia, as she'll be honored to hear the nice things you said about her. Please come back and visit us again soon!

Summary: Morning check-in wasn't as friendly  she wasnt rude but was very to the point just did her job but everyone else was super friendly housekeeping was polite and very helpful shower needed slight repair overall was a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. We are glad to know that you had a great experience overall and appreciated our friendly housekeeping team. That being said, we will review your concerns with our front desk tea. All the best to you, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary: Refrigerator is not a real one. It’s a cooler. You have to turn it back on every couple hours. No freezer. A/C doesn’t go lower than 68 and never auto turns off. Dirty. Also parking is 25 plus tax. $29.50. Lobby looks nice. Rooms are trash.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing feedback about your recent experience at our hotel. We're glad to know you found our lobby well-appointed, however, we're sorry you were disappointed with our accommodations. While not a typical occurrence for our guests, your comments are important to us as we continually work to improve our facility and the comfort of our patrons. Given another opportunity, we would like to provide you with the stay you expected.

Summary: I was excited to see this new property. The Hotel Lulu was previously the Red Lion Inn. It’s super cute when you walk in. The staff were sparse but friendly. Check in went fine. Room was cute and clean. You can tell it’s renovated but overall looks good.  Day 1 I met up with friends and left the hotel returned, showered, bedtime. Day 2 I woke up bought a delicious latte at the lobby coffee bar, asked if there were breakfast options (a restaurant) and was told no, they just sell pastries, so I  headed out for the day. Returned and the room wasn’t made. I know in the first year of Covid housekeeping services were suspended but saw carts in the hallways and  believed it had resumed. I called the front desk to ask. They informed me only if you request housekeeping. I asked the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. It's nice to know our updated property made a great first impression. However, we sincerely apologize for aspects of your visit that didn't meet your expectations. As you mentioned, housekeeping service is available upon request, and additional information about this can be found online. Your feedback will aid us as we continue making improvements. Having said that, it's nice to know you otherwise enjoyed our clean, charming accommodations and fantastic lattes. We appreciate you reaching out and wish you safe and pleasant journeys.

Summary: We weren’t really welcomed into the hotel upon arrival. The man who checked us in had attitude and wasn’t friendly at all. The overall hotel was nice and was reasonably priced. But the staff was extremely unfriendly.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host you as our valued guest. We aim to warmly welcome each of our guests to our hotel, so we're distressed if you didn't receive the level of service you deserved. Rest assured, we'll work diligently to improve in this area as we strive to create a comfortable home-away-from-home environment for our visitors. Thank you for sharing your compliment on our property and our desirable room rates. Next time you travel to Anaheim, we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: The staff at this hotel was amazing! Super friendly, kind, patient, and understanding. It really did feel like they cared about me personally and worked hard to make my stay comfortable. I also loved the in-room coffee and kettle!
Manager Response: Dear Ryan, Our amazing staff works hard to ensure all our guests feel welcome and will be proud you appreciated their exceptional service. It's also great to know that you appreciated the in-room amenities. If you're in the area again, we welcome you back to our hotel.

Summary: We switched hotels due to our flight home being canceled and we collectively agreed that we wished we would have stayed here versus other hotels in this area! The hotel is so cute and updated, fresh and clean! Staff is friendly & helpful as well!
Manager Response: Our friendly staff works hard to ensure all our guests feel welcome and will be glad you appreciated their kind assistance. It's our hope you get to stay with us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection the next time you are in the area.

Summary: This hotel  is within walking distance of Disneyland. Staff and rooms are great. It is a little pricey but worth it. I am hoping to stay here again if prices stay reasonable. Rooms are very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle, Thank you for making Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection, a part of your trip. We're glad our location was ideal for your plans and that our friendly staff made you feel welcome. If your travels bring you back to the area, we'd be happy to host you again.

Summary Heading: Because of Sam, I will book again.
Summary: Sam went above and beyond for our accommodations I can not thank her enough. She was kind and welcoming helped us with an early check in, I didn't even mention it was our daughter's birthday and a special trip she just treated it as such!! what a great start to our trip!
Manager Response: Dear Aprille, Thank you for taking a moment to share your kind words! We'll be sure to recognize Sam for continually providing exceptional hospitality. We hope your daughter had a memorable birthday celebration. It would be our pleasure to serve you again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary: Great location by Disneyland wonderful staff from check in to Maid service. Very clean and comfortable. Rooms were very nice and beds were very comfortable. Everyone was friendly and ready to help. I would gladly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent trip to Anaheim. A great location close to a wonderful theme park, amazing service, and clean and comfortable accommodations all await our guests when they visit with us. It's the best compliment knowing you'll spend time with us again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We hope you come back soon!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, but old hotel
Summary: About a ten minute walk to Disneyland and nice staff, but an old hotel.  Beds were clean and comfortable. however, rooms are very dated and did not seem very clean. One of the elevators was not working.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host your vacation. Our property is just a short walk away from Disneyland, making us the perfect choice for those visiting the theme park. However, we apologize that one of our elevators was down for maintenance, as well as the other concerns you've mentioned. Despite this, we appreciate you highlighting our comfortable and clean beds, and we trust you had a restful night's sleep after a busy day on your feet. We hope you will consider staying with us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This was a cute place with excellent service! It was well worth the price I paid and I would definitely stay again! Only issue was the water pressure and heat for water seemed minimal! There is Lots of parking too!
Manager Response: Dear Laura, From our excellent service to our plentiful parking, we're thrilled that you had such a wonderful time at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! Rest assured, we are looking into the water pressure issue you encountered, and we look forward to offering up another fantastic value on your next trip to the area; until then!

Summary: Every aspect of our stay exceeded our expectations! Great staff especially Miss Adora, she went above and beyond providing thee absolute BEST customer service at Hotel Lulu. We will definitely recommend this hotel to our family and friends and most definitely will be coming back!
Manager Response: Dear Aleesha, It's delightful to read that our outstanding staff could play a pivotal role in taking your stay beyond your expectations. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and we can't wait to see you again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection the next time your travels point you back in our direction.

Summary: Beautiful property. Comfy rooms. However, I do want to commend your staff for such a warm & welcoming experience. I was very impressed with your front desk agent, Adora! She was very knowledgeable of her work & very welcoming. We need more people like her in this industry!! My family & I will definitely be back!!
Manager Response: Dear Vanna, Our amazing staff works hard to ensure all our guests feel welcome and will be glad you appreciated their exceptional service. It's also great to know that our comfortable rooms added to your experience. If you're in the area again, please come back to see us at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary Heading: Had a great visit thanks to….
Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at Hotel Lulu. The front desk agent Adora was professional, courteous and helpful.  We aren’t from the area and she gave us great recommendations and food spots of what is in the area.  Keep up the great work, Adora!
Manager Response: Dear Veanz, We're delighted you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection and that you felt welcome while you were here. The next time you're in town, please come see us again.

Summary: Hi I am Miguel Angel Solorio And I'd like to tell everyone that Hotel Lulu Is a One if a Kind Hotel Starting with the front desk staff Claudia & Lorena to name a few because they all share the same quality in making sure my stay and every one else's is a 5* visit & I Guarantee it. No other Hotel gives you the quality and attention to details like Hotel Lulu & the entire staff. I am self employed and do visit different Hotels frequently, as A Roofer we move from city to city often and most times I do drive the extra mile to make sure I stay at a quality Hotel like Hotel Lulu. * Oh before I forget upon checking in you will receive a complementary Drink pass at  Lulu Bar ~ Amazing ! Best Regards Miguel's Roofing & Waterproofing (714) 231-0445
Manager Response: Dear Miguel, Our amazing staff works hard to ensure all our guests feel welcome and will be proud you appreciated their exceptional service. Thank you for your kind words. It will be a pleasure hosting you again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary: Great clean hotel and super quiet! Close to Disney Land, restaurants, etc. Our room was super clean, the lobby was great and the staff were super friendly. The only complaint was parking wasn't included but it was still cheaper than surrounding options. Great value all around and underrated in my opinion.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection during your visit to Anaheim. Whether you are looking for cozy accommodations to relax in or a fantastic location, you can bet that we will deliver this and more. We hope you had a blast at Disneyland and exploring other local attractions. Come back and visit us again anytime you need another wonderful getaway.

Summary Heading: Hotel needs a lot of TLC
Summary: Noisy, you could hear everything in the hall.  Elevator dinged all hours of the day. Front door down upon check-in and parking is $25 a day?? and the exit parking gate was broken the entire stay and we were lectured on proper exit/entry with pass, when we replied gate was up the front desk replied that she forgot it was down and they called for service after just lecturing us about it. Key cards for the room kept deactivating so we had to keep going to the front desk to rekey them, started with 2 keys ended up with 3 and only 1 of the 3 keys worked the entire stay. On the 3rd day we wanted the room cleaned and when we returned at 830 pm,the room hadn't been serviced so we called for towels. No shampoo, conditioner or lotion in the bathroom, thought the hotel didn't offer any
Manager Response: Dear Theresa, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us your feedback. It is our mission to ensure that guests are having the best experience possible and to hear that we may have fallen short is disheartening. Please know that if your accommodations are not up to your expectations, our front desk is always available to help find a solution. Nevertheless, we will discuss your comments to ensure that we are delivering the quality service and stay that we are known for.

Summary Heading: Convenient, comfy, and close to Disney!
Summary: *also left a review on yelp*  Hotel Lulu was a great hotel to stay in for our Disney Vacation, although it’s not across the street from the Main gates of Disney, it’s still a decent walk (approximately 7-10 min) from The hotel to the gate! The staff was super friendly and even allowed us to check in early after arriving from Vegas earlier than expected. Hotel Lulu isn’t a 5 star resort by any means but that doesn’t stop them from treating you like a 5 star guest! The room was pretty big! The beds were quite comfy (to each their own) the tv was perfect size for the room. One of my issues was the heater, all though it’s slightly outdated, it’s still works great.. however it was a bit tough trying to find a way to keep it at a certain temp. After about 10 minutes I was able to get
Manager Response: We enjoyed hosting you at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. Thank you for taking the time to highlight our enviable location, just a short walk from Disneyland! While we apologize if you could hear any noise from the elevator, we're so glad it wasn't an issue at night and that you slept soundly in our comfortable beds. Should you travel back to Anaheim in the future, you can depend on us for clean accommodations and friendly service!

Summary Heading: My stay At Lulu’s Anaheim Hotel
Summary: Great profesional and courteous service from staff Specially from Claudia at the front desk calling by my name ant it’s not too popular and always Conrad with great personality they made us feel home and welcomed Rooms are awesome and very clean  The hotel it’s in a great location with walking distance to Disney Restaurants and shops
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your stay at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. It is fantastic to hear that you liked our clean, comfortable rooms and friendly, helpful staff. Please come back and see us again in the future.

Summary: Finally using our Disney tix from March 2020!  One of my kids needs a lot of breaks during the day. This hotel was well-located for walks back and forth and a great value!  Room was spacious, clean and modern.
Manager Response: We were happy to provide you with clean, convenient accommodations, and we're glad our location worked well for your trip. The next time you're in town, please come see us again soon at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection!

Summary: Out of the many many years that I have been going to the Disneyland area and staying in hotels hotel Lulu is by far the worst I’ve stayed at.   About a week before my check in date, I called the hotel to confirm my reservation and as well as ask about early check-in. The gentleman who answered the phone was very nice and advise me to call the hotel the morning I left my home to check the status of early check-in.   On the morning on my check in date, I called at 1:30am an inquiry about early check-in. The employee who answered the phone and advised it wouldn’t be a problem after said I would be there from 10am to noon.   I drove 9 hours to the hotel and once I got to the hotel I was advised buy the employee that no rooms were available for early check in but if I would wait
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciated the opportunity to host your trip, and we apologize that your stay didn't meet your expectations. While our official check-in time is 4 pm, we try to honor early check-in requests when we can. It's unfortunate that your room wasn't available until 3 pm, and we're very sorry for the conflicting communication you received. Your comments will be shared with our front desk team, so this won't happen again. Our housekeeping staff strives to keep our rooms clean and tidy, and they will refocus their efforts on the areas you noted. We greatly appreciate your valuable feedback, and we hope to have another chance to impress you in the future.

Summary Heading: Amazing stay at Hotel Lulu, BW
Summary: First off, being greeted by Sam at the front desk and her friendly and helpfulness started are stay on a great path. Sam was great with helping get us register in  and answered any questions we had with a smile. She was wonderful.
