The entire staff were always friendly and helpful as well whenever there was a question during our stay. Rooms were comfortable and quiet even on the street side. Easy walking distance to the Disneyland park, restaurants and shops.  Rooms were clean and very up to date. Parking was easy, safe and a blessing to have
Manager Response: It brightens our day to know that your stay was nothing short of exceptional! Providing clean and safe accommodations, as well as phenomenal hospitality, is always our goal; we're delighted to hear your kind words. Our team trusts you had a fantastic trip to Disneyland, and it would be our pleasure to serve you again at Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection.

Summary: We recently stayed at Hotel Lulu to experience a day at Disneyland and get our son's second vaccine. The hotel was better than my expectations. I loved the decor, the location was great and the staff we really nice and approachable! Disneyland was walkable and an excellent location to access the park. CVS & Walgreens are both super close to pick up basic drinks, food and snacks. We really enjoyed Blaze Pizza which was a 1 min walk away. Overall we would love to stay at Hotel Lulu again and I highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review and for choosing Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We are delighted you enjoyed our central location, friendly staff, and welcoming decor. Please come back and stay with us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Reasonable priced hotel three blocks from Disneyland entrance. Poor hot water. AC did not work very well at all. Comfortable room and bed. Large TV with lots of channels. Had a pool, but did not use. Had a workout room. Did not see a hot tub. WiFi was sufficient, but not real fast. Hotel was quiet, even with lots of kids staying there. Small bar area, with bar snacks for purchase. No actual restaurant on site, but plenty in walking distance. There is a Walgreens and CVS in ½ block. Definitely in need of an upgrade, but will stay here again.  $25 per day is a little pricey.
Manager Response: Dear Owen, Thank you for your recent stay with us. Guest feedback is appreciated and welcome, and we thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We always strive to exceed the needs of our visitors, so while we're glad to know you appreciated our quiet accommodations and convenient location, we apologize that other aspects of your experience didn't meet your expectations. As a result, we will pass along your constructive feedback to our maintenance team. It would be an honor to welcome you back to our hotel the next time you're in Anaheim.

Summary: Short walk to Disneyland, about 10 minutes. The staff are so nice and very pleasant. Nice fire pits by pool for relaxing, fun games send a little bar area as well. You might need to ask for more towels, but they are very kind and will get you what you need. There aren't many drawers in the room but there is plenty of desk space and shelves too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words about your recent visit to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection! We hope you had a fabulous vacation here in sunny Anaheim. It's wonderful to know that you found our location ideal for your visit to Disneyland and that our friendly staff took good care of you throughout your stay. If you find yourself back in the area, it would be our pleasure to host you again!

Summary Heading: Great stay for first Disney visit!
Summary: I wanted to be close to Disneyland for my very first visit with my sister. Hotel Lulu absolutely was the best choice! It's only 8 mins away from the main entrance walking, right next to an ihop (for a quick dine-in breakfast), not far from other food places in walking distance, and a bus stop is right next to it as well. It was a short walk away from a Walgreens as well for last minute items I forgot to pack and to get snacks for the day at Disney. It's a simple building with modern and subtle disney decor (we went during Thanksgiving week so there was holiday decor was well). The staff was so helpful at the front desk and made us feel welcome. The room was very nice, and the bed definitely was the comfiest after a long day at the parks. I will definitely book here again for my
Manager Response: What a pleasure for us to receive your outstanding review of your recent visit to Hotel Lulu, BW Premier Collection. We're so glad our accommodations exceeded your expectations. Great location, a comfortable rest, and amazing and helpful staff are all aspects our guests can expect to find when they stay with us. It's a wonderful compliment to know you'll spend time with us again when you return to Anaheim. Come back soon.
